<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Whats</span></b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
24.0pt;font-family:Arial'> the Time?</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In a manufacturing industry,
continuous chemical reaction occurs inside a processing unit. The unit is
equivalent to a large tank with huge (you can consider infinite) capacity.
There are several inlets and outlets. Each inlet or outlet has a certain
capacity and period. For example, if an inlet has capacity 10 and period 5, it
means in first 5 unit time, 10 unit chemicals enter into the processing unit in
each unit time and in next 5 unit <span class=GramE>time</span>, it is kept
closed. Now consider in the start, the processing unit contains a particular
amount of chemicals. The amount of chemicals will change with time inside the
processing unit. We are interested to know the time when, the processing unit
will reach a particular amount.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now a peculiar incident can occur
 the processing unit is empty and at that time outlets are open. In that case,
immergence reservoir will be used which will be again refilled when the
chemicals will be available.</p>

<h3><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each input set will start with
two positive integers N (1 &#8804; N &#8804; 12) and K<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'> </b>where N denotes the number of inlets/outlets and K is the current
amount inside the processing unit. It is followed by the period (At most 12) and
capacity (Absolute value at most 100) of each <span class=GramE>openings</span>.
The capacity will be positive in case of inlets and it will be negative for
outlets. The next line will contain the desired amount inside the processing
unit. All inputs will be integers and there can be at most 5000 data sets.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will be terminated with N=0
and K=0. //Integer means 32-bit signed integer</p>

<h3><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test set, print the
serial of output followed by a floating point number that indicates the minimum
time by which the processing unit will contain the desired amount. If the
processing unit never contains the desired unit, print Impossible. See the
sample input-output for more information.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 397<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>12 -35<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6 25<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>67121<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 -3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: Impossible.<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 199.00000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:26.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.preformatted, li.preformatted, div.preformatted
	{mso-style-name:preformatted;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in 1.0in 1.0in 1.0in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="9218"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Place the Guards</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600"
 o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f"
 stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 margin-left:0;margin-top:13.1pt;width:150.3pt;height:152.55pt;z-index:1'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=200 height=203
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/g_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In the country of <span
class=SpellE>Ajabdesh</span> there are some streets and junctions. Each street
connects 2 junctions. The king of <span class=SpellE>Ajabdesh</span> wants to
place some guards in some junctions so that all the junctions and streets can
be guarded by them. A guard in a junction can guard all the junctions and streets
adjacent to it. But the guards themselves are not gentle. If a street is
guarded by multiple guards then they start fighting. So the king does not want
the scenario where a street may be guarded by two guards. Given the information
about the streets and junctions of <span class=SpellE>Ajabdesh</span>, help the
king to find the minimum number of guards needed to guard all the junctions and
streets of his country.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input
contains a single integer T (T&lt;80) indicating the number of test cases. Each
test case begins with 2 <span class=GramE>integers</span> v (1 <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804; </b>v <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>&#8804; </b>200) and e (0 <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804;
</b>e <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804; </b>10000.). <span
class=GramE>v</span> is the number of junctions and e is the number of streets.
Each of the next e line contains 2 integer f and t denoting that there is a
street between f and t. All the junctions are numbered from 0 to v-1.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output in a
single line an integer m denoting the minimum number of guards needed to guard
all the junctions and streets. Set the value of m as -1 if it is impossible to
place the guards without fighting.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 <span class=SpellE>5</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>-1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;

<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Strings</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given 3 strings of only lowercase
letter you have to count the number of ways you can construct the third string
by combining two subsequences from the first two strings. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>After deleting 0 or more
characters from a string we can get its subsequence. For example a, b, c,
<span class=SpellE>ab</span>, ac, <span class=SpellE>bc</span> and <span
class=SpellE>abc</span> all the strings are the subsequences of <span
class=SpellE>abc</span>. A subsequence may also be empty.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now suppose there are two
subsequences <span class=SpellE>abc</span> and de. By combining them you
can get the following <span class=GramE>strings<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span></span><span class=SpellE>abcde</span>, <span class=SpellE>abdce</span>,
<span class=SpellE>abdec</span>, <span class=SpellE>adbce</span>, <span
class=SpellE>adbec</span>, <span class=SpellE>adebc</span>, <span
class=SpellE>dabce</span>, <span class=SpellE>dabec</span>, <span
class=SpellE>daebc</span> and <span class=SpellE>deabc</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input
contains a single integer T (0&lt;T&lt;271) indicating the number of test
cases.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each test case contains 3 strings
containing only lowercase characters. The lengths of the strings are between 1
and 60.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output a
single integer denoting the number of ways you can construct the third string
from the first two string by the above way. The result may be very large. You
should output the result%10007. </p>

<h1><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold;mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h1>

<h1><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>abc</span></b></span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'> <span class=SpellE>abc</span> <span class=SpellE>abc</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>abbcd</span></b></span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'> <span class=SpellE>bccde</span> <span class=SpellE>abcde</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>18<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Problemsetter</span>: Abdullah-al-<span
class=SpellE>Mahmud</span> </p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Special Thanks: <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:State w:st="on">Md.</st1:State></st1:place>
<span class=SpellE>Kamruzzaman</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="8194"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Matrix Decompressing</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Some <span class=SpellE>RxC</span>
matrix of positive integers is encoded and represented by its R cumulative row
sum and C column sum entries. Given, R, C and those R+C cumulative row sum and
column sums, you want to decode the matrix (i.e., find all the individual R*C
entries).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here,</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:.5in'><span
style='position:relative;top:69.0pt;mso-text-raise:-69.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:186pt;
 height:2in' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/i_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=248 height=192
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/i_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1218529945">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Or in other words, the <span
class=SpellE>i-th</span> row sum is the <span class=GramE>sum of all the
entries in row</span> <span class=SpellE>i</span>. And the cumulative <span
class=SpellE>i-th</span> row sum is the sum of all the row sums from row 1 to
row <span class=SpellE>i</span> (inclusive). </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There can be multiple test cases.
The first line of input contains the number of test cases, T (1 &#8804;T &#8804;
100). Each test case contains 3 lines of input. The first line of the test case
gives the size of the matrix: the number of rows, R (1 &#8804; R &#8804; 20)
and the number of columns C (1 &#8804; C &#8804;20). The next line contains all
the R cumulative row sums, and the last line of the test case contains the C
cumulative column sums. Any two successive numbers in the same line is
separated by a single space.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case print the
label of the test case in the first line. The format of this label should be
Matrix x where x would be replaced by the serial number of the test case
starting at 1. In each of the following R lines print C integers giving all the
individual entries of the matrix. You can assume that there is at least one
solution for each of the given encodings. To simplify the problem further, we
add the constraint that each entry in the matrix must be an integer between 1
and 20. In case of multiple solutions, you can output any one of them.</p>

<span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;
mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all style='mso-special-character:line-break;
page-break-before:always'>
</span>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 31 58<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 20 37 58<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 31 58<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 20 37 58<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Matrix 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 6 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 <span class=SpellE>2</span> 16<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>8 2 14 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Matrix 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 7 12<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>8 <span class=SpellE>8</span> 9 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<span class=SpellE>Hasan</span> </p>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="9218"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]--></HEAD>
<BODY lang=EN-US style="tab-interval: .5in">
<DIV class=Section1>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" align=center><B 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 28pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Problem 
J</SPAN></B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><BR></SPAN><B 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 20pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; mso-bidi-font-size: 24.0pt">Zeroes 
Revisited</SPAN></B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><BR><B 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">Input: </B><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: bold">Standard Input<o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" align=center><B 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Output: 
</SPAN></B><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold">Standard 
Output<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P class=MsoBodyText2 style="tab-stops: 143.25pt"><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">All the veteran contestants know that the 
number of occurrences of prime number <I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">p</I> in factorial <I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n</I> (<I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n!</I>) can be found using the formula 
below:<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText2 style="tab-stops: 143.25pt">&nbsp;</P>
<center><img width=280 height=51 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/p11083a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"></center></span><SPAN 
style="POSITION: relative; TOP: 15pt; mso-text-raise: -15.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype 
id=_x0000_t75 coordsize = "21600,21600" o:preferrelative = "t" o:spt = "75" 
filled = "f" stroked = "f" path = " m@4@5 l@4@11@9@11@9@5 xe"><v:stroke 
joinstyle = "miter"></v:stroke><v:formulas><v:f eqn = 
"if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0 "></v:f><v:f eqn = "sum @0 1 0 "></v:f><v:f eqn = 
"sum 0 0 @1 "></v:f><v:f eqn = "prod @2 1 2 "></v:f><v:f eqn = 
"prod @3 21600 pixelWidth "></v:f><v:f eqn = 
"prod @3 21600 pixelHeight "></v:f><v:f eqn = "sum @0 0 1 "></v:f><v:f eqn = 
"prod @6 1 2 "></v:f><v:f eqn = "prod @7 21600 pixelWidth "></v:f><v:f eqn = 
"sum @8 21600 0 "></v:f><v:f eqn = "prod @7 21600 pixelHeight "></v:f><v:f eqn = 
"sum @10 21600 0 "></v:f></v:formulas><v:path o:extrusionok = "f" 
gradientshapeok = "t" o:connecttype = "rect"></v:path><o:lock aspectratio="t" 
v:ext="edit"></o:lock></v:shapetype><v:shape id=_x0000_i1026 
style="WIDTH: 210pt; HEIGHT: 38.25pt" o:ole="  type = "#_x0000_t75" coordsize = 
"21600,21600"><v:imagedata o:title="  src = 
"j_files/image001.wmz"></v:imagedata></v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><![endif]></SPAN><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1218529986">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->
  <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; tab-stops: 143.25pt">This formula 
can effectively be used to find the number of trailing zeroes of <I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n<SPAN class=GramE>!<SPAN 
style="FONT-STYLE: normal">,</SPAN></SPAN></I> in any number system. Let <SPAN 
class=GramE><I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">z(</I></SPAN><SPAN 
class=SpellE><I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n,b</I></SPAN><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">)</I> be a function which denotes the number 
of trailing zeroes of <I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n!</I>, in number 
system <I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">b</I>. A new function <SPAN 
class=SpellE><SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">soz</I></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">(</I></SPAN><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n)</I> is defined as</P>
<center><img width=167 height=58 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/p11083a.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"></center>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; tab-stops: 143.25pt">While the 
computation of <SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">z(</I></SPAN><SPAN class=SpellE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n,b</I></SPAN><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">)</I> is quite easy, the computation of 
<SPAN class=SpellE><I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">soz</I></SPAN><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">(n)</I> is not that efficient in a straight 
forward way. Given the value of <I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n</I> and 
the base <I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">b</I>, your job is to find out 
the value of <SPAN class=SpellE><SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">soz</I></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">(</I></SPAN><SPAN class=SpellE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n,b</I></SPAN><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">)</I>. </P>
<H5><SPAN class=StyleArial16pt><I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal"><SPAN 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 16pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">Input</SPAN></I></SPAN><SPAN 
class=StyleArial16pt><I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal"><SPAN 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 16pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS'"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></I></SPAN></H5>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify">The input file contains at most 
1200 lines of inputs. Each line contains two integers <SPAN 
class=GramE>n(</SPAN>0 &#8804; n &#8804; 4000000000) and b(1 &lt; b &#8804; 100000). <I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">Here the base b is a square free 
number</I><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">.</B> A square free number is 
a number which is not divisible by any square number other than 1. So the value 
of b can be 10 but the value of b cannot be 24, as 24 <SPAN 
class=GramE>is</SPAN> divisible by a square 4. Input is terminated by a line 
where the value of n and b is zero. This line should not be processed.</P>
<H4><SPAN class=StyleArial16pt><SPAN style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">Output 
</SPAN></SPAN><SPAN class=StyleArial16pt><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></H4>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; tab-stops: 143.25pt">For each 
line of input except the last one produce one line of output. This line contains 
an integer which denotes the value of <SPAN class=SpellE><SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">soz</I></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN class=GramE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">(</I></SPAN><SPAN class=SpellE><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">n,b</I></SPAN><I 
style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">)</I>. You can assume that the output 
integers will fit in 64-bit signed integers.</P>
<H1><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal; mso-bidi-font-style: italic">Sample 
Input<SPAN 
style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
</SPAN>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></SPAN></H1>
<TABLE class=MsoNormalTable 
style="BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-TOP: medium none; BACKGROUND: #cccccc; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-COLLAPSE: collapse; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt" 
cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=1>
  <TBODY>
  <TR style="mso-yfti-irow: 0; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-lastrow: yes">
    <TD 
    style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 3.2in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" 
    vAlign=top width=307><PRE><B><SPAN style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">10 <SPAN class=SpellE>10</SPAN><o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></PRE><PRE><B><SPAN style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">10 14<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></PRE><PRE><B><SPAN style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">10000000 10<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></PRE><PRE><B><SPAN style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">0 <SPAN class=SpellE>0</SPAN> <o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></PRE></TD>
    <TD 
    style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 231.85pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" 
    vAlign=top width=309>
      <P class=MsoNormal 
      style="tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt"><B><SPAN 
      style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">7<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></P>
      <P class=MsoNormal 
      style="tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt"><B><SPAN 
      style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">4<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></P>
      <P class=MsoNormal 
      style="tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt"><B><SPAN 
      style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">12499951484374<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></P></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE>
<DIV class=MsoNormal 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt" 
align=center>
<HR align=center width="100%" SIZE=2>

<P class=MsoNormal><SPAN class=SpellE>Problemsetter</SPAN>: Shahriar Manzoor

style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></P>

<title>Anagram Division</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem A: Anagram Division</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<br>
  Output: standard output</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given a string <b>s</b> and a
  positive integer <b>d</b> you have to determine how many permutations of <b>s</b>
  are divisible by <b>d</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input
  contains one integer <b>T</b> the number of test cases. Each of the test
  cases is one line containing <b>s</b> and <b>d</b> separated by a single
  space.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output
  contains an integer the number of permutations of <b>s</b> that are divisible
  by <b>d</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>s</b>
  contains only digits.<br>
  -<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span>The length of <b>s</b> is
  between 1 and 10 inclusive.<br>
  -<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>d</b> is a positive
  integer between 1 and 10000.<b><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3<br>
  000 1<br>
  1234567890 1<br>
  123434 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1<br>
  3628800<br>
  90<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Abdullah Al Mahmud</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

<html xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office"
xmlns:w="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40">

<head>
<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
<meta name=ProgId content=Word.Document>
<meta name=Generator content="Microsoft Word 9">
<meta name=Originator content="Microsoft Word 9">
<title>Back to the 8-Queens</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:DocumentProperties>
  <o:Author>cse</o:Author>
  <o:Template>Normal</o:Template>

  <o:CharactersWithSpaces>1316</o:CharactersWithSpaces>
  <o:Version>9.2720</o:Version>
 </o:DocumentProperties>
</xml><![endif]-->
<style>
<!--
 /* Style Definitions */
p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in 1.25in 1.0in 1.25in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem B: Back to the 8-Queens</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are given a chess board (of
  <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>8x8</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  bold'> dimension</span>) and there are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>8</b>
  queens placed randomly on the board. Each of the 8 queens is in different
  columns and that means no two queens are attacking each other vertically. But
  some queens are attacking each other horizontally and/or diagonally. You have
  to move the queens so that no two queens are attacking each other from any
  direction. You are allowed to move the queens vertically and thus you can
  only change the row positions of each queen and not the column. A move
  consists of moving a queen from (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>R<sub>1</sub>,
  C</b>) to (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>R<sub>2</sub>, C</b>) where
  <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; R<sub>1</sub>, R<sub>2</sub>
  &#8804; 8</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>R<sub>1</sub>
  &#8800; R<sub>2</sub></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>.</span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><sub><o:p></o:p></sub></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You have to find the minimum
  number of moves required to complete the task.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be multiple test
  cases. Each case consists of a line containing <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>8</b> integers. All these integers will be in the range [<b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1, 8</b>]. The <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>i-th</b> integer indicates the row position of a queen in the <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i-th</b> column.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case, output the case
  number followed by the required output.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span>Total
  number of test cases will be less than <b>1000</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8<br>
  1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 7<br>
  Case 2: 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem C: Composite Prime</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<br>
  Output: standard output</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:4'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A prime number is a number that
  cannot be factored. More precisely, a number <b>p</b> is a prime if it has
  only the trivial divisors i.e. <b>1</b> and <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
  italic'>p</span></b>. The set of prime numbers is a subset of the set of
  natural numbers (the set of natural numbers is normally denoted by <b>N</b>).</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Let us consider another subset
  of <b>N</b>. Let us call this set <b>M</b>. <i>A number <b>m</b> is a member
  of <b>M</b> if <b>m = x × y</b> where <b>x &gt; 1</b> and <b>y &gt; 1</b></i>.
  Both <b>x</b> and <b>y</b> are natural numbers.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  11.0pt'>You have to find the prime numbers for this new set of number. Let us
  call these numbers <b>composite prime</b>. A <b>composite prime</b> is a
  number in <b>M</b> that does not have any divisor (except itself) in the set <b>M</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Note: 1 is the first positive natural
  number and this is not a prime but in new number set first number is 4 and
  you have to keep in mind that this is the first composite prime.</span><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:5'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:6'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of several
  test cases. First line of each test case contains one integer <b>K</b>. In
  the next line there are <b>K</b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'> positive
  integers. Input will be terminated by end-of-file.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:7'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:8'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print one
  line containing a single integer which indicates the number of composite
  primes in the input.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:9'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:10'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span>All the
  numbers in the input including <b>K</b> is less than <b>2<sup>20</sup><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:11'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:12'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4<br>
  3 4 6 8<br>
  5<br>
  12 13 21 22 23<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<br>
  2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:13'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:14;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: </span></b><st1:State><st1:place><b><span
    style='font-family:Arial'>Md.</span></b></st1:place></st1:State><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Erfanul Hoque Siddiqi<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Alternate Solution: Tanveer Ahsan</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D: Divisibility Testing</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<br>
  Output: standard output</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You will be given a list of <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> integers, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>&lt;a<sub>1</sub> a<sub>2</sub> a<sub>3</sub> . . . a<sub>n</sub>&gt;
  </b>and an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>k</b>. Find out the
  number of ways of choosing <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>
  integers (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a<sub>i</sub></b>, <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a<sub>j</sub>), </b>such that <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a<sub>i</sub> &#8804; a<sub>j</sub></b>
  and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; i, j &#8804; n</b> and <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i &#8800; j</b> and (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>a<sub>i</sub> + a<sub>j</sub></b>) is divisible by <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>k</b>. Every pair must be distinct. Two
  pairs, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(a, b)</b> and <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(c, d)</b>, are equal if <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>a</b> is equal to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>c</b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>b</b> is equal to <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>d</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Suppose we are given <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>5</b> integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>&lt;4 1 2 2 3&gt; </b>and<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> k =
  1. </b>There are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>7</b> ways of
  choosing different pairs that meets the above restrictions.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>(1, 2) (1, 3) (1, 4) (2, 2) (2, 3) (2, 4) (3, 4).<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input
  contains an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b> that
  determines the number of test cases. Each test case contains two lines. The
  first line consists of two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b>
  and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>k</b>. The next line contains <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> integers. The <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>i-th</b> integer gives the value of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>a<sub>i</sub></b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output the
  case number followed by the number of ways to choose the pairs.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T &lt; 100<br>
  </b>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>1 &lt; n &lt; 100001<br>
  </b>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>0 &lt; k &lt; 501<br>
  </b>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>|a<sub><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>i</span></sub>| &lt; 10000001</b> for any <b>i<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<br>
  5 1<br>
  4 1 2 2 3<br>
  5 2<br>
  4 1 2 2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 7<br>
  Case 2: 3</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Sohel Hafiz</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<title>End up with More Teams</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
