<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem E: End up with More Teams<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The prestigious ICPC is here
  again. The coaches are busy selecting teams. Well this year, they have
  adopted a new policy. Contrary to traditional selection process, where few
  individual contests are held and the top three are placed in one team the
  next three in another and so on, this year the coaches decided to place
  members in such a way that the total number of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
  normal'>promising</i> teams is maximized. <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Promising</i>
  teams are defined as a team having <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>ability
  points</i> of its members adding up to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>20</b>
  or greater. Here <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>ability point</i> of a
  member denotes his capability as a programmer, the higher the better.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be as many as 100
  cases in the input file. Each case of input has two lines. The first line
  contains a positive integer<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>, </b>where
  <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> indicates the number contestants
  available for selection. The next line will contain <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>n</b> positive integers, each of which will be at most 30.<span
  style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>End of input is indicated by a value of <b>0</b>
  for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n.</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For every case of input there
  will be one line of output. This line should contain the case number followed
  by the maximum number of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>promising
  teams</i> that can be formed. Note that it is not mandatory to assign
  everyone in a team. Incase you dont know, each team consists of exactly 3
  members.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>&#8804;
  </span>15<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>9<br>
  22 20 9 10 19 30 2 4 16<br>
  2<br>
  15 3<br>
  0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 3<br>
  Case 2: 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Shamim Hafiz</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<title>Fi-binary Number</title>

	margin:1.0in 1.25in 1.0in 1.25in;

	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}

	{page:Section1;}
-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F: Fi-binary Number</span></b><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A Fi-binary number is a number
  that contains only 0 and 1. It does not contain any leading 0. And also it
  does not contain 2 consecutive 1. The first few such number are 1, 10, 100,
  101, 1000, 1001, 1010, 10000, 10001, 10010, 10100, 10101 and so on. You are
  given <b>n</b>. You have to calculate the <b>nth</b> Fi-Binary number.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input
  contains one integer <b>T</b> the number of test cases. Each test case
  contains one integer <b>n</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output one
  line containing the <b>nth</b> Fi-Binary number.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>1
  &#8804; N &#8804; 10<sup>9</sup><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4<br>
  10<br>
  20<br>
  30<br>
  40<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>10010<br>
  101010<br>
  1010001<br>
  10001001<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Abdullah Al Mahmud</span></b></p>
  </td>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem G: Going in Cycle!!</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are given a weighted
  directed graph with <b>n</b> vertices and <b>m</b> edges. Each cycle in the
  graph has a weight, which equals to sum of its edges. There are so many cycles
  in the graph with different weights. In this problem we want to find a cycle
  with the minimum mean.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input gives
  the number of cases, <b>N</b>. <b>N</b> test cases follow. Each one starts
  with two numbers <b>n</b> and <b>m</b>. <b>m</b> lines follow, each has three
  positive number <b>a, b, c</b> which means there is an edge from vertex <b>a</b>
  to <b>b</b> with weight of <b>c</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <h1>Output</h1>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output one
  line containing <b>Case #x:</b>  followed by a number that is the lowest
  mean cycle in graph with 2 digits after decimal place, if there is a cycle.
  Otherwise print <b>No cycle found.</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>n
  &#8804; 50<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>a, b
  &#8804; n<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>c
  &#8804; 10000000</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<br>
  2 1<br>
  1 2 1<br>
  2 2<br>
  1 2 2<br>
  2 1 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #1: No
  cycle found.<br>
  Case #2: 2.50<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Mohammad Tavakoli Ghinani<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <h2>Alternate Solution: Cho</h2>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<title>How many Knight Placing?</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='width:100.0%;
 border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H: How many Knight
  Placing?</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are given a <b>6*n</b>
  chessboard. Yes it is not a regular chessboard. The number of columns in this
  chessboard is variable. In each of the columns you have to place exactly 2
  knights. So you have to place total <b>2*n</b> knights. You have to count the
  number of valid placing of these <b>2*n</b> knight. A placing is invalid if
  any of the 2 knights attack each other. Those who are not familiar with
  knight moves <b>A knight in cell(x,y) attacks the knights in the
  cell(x±2,y±1) and cell(x±1,y±2)</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input
  contains a single integer <b>T</b> indicating the number of test cases.<span
  style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>Each test case contains a single integer <b>n</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output an
  integer the number of valid placing. The integer may be very large. So just
  output the result%10007.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>T
  &#8804; 15<br>
  </b>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>1 &#8804; n &lt;
  1000000000<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4<br>
  1<br>
  10<br>
  100<br>
  1000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;border-right:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>15<br>
  178<br>
  30<br>
  8141<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Abdullah Al Mahmud</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem I: IIUC HexWorld</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:4'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText2>Alice and Bob reside in Independent Impeccable United
  Countries (IIUC)  a land of the free. There, all the houses are placed in a
  hexagonal grid. The kings palace is numbered 0 and all others are numbered
  1, 2, 3 ... spirally keeping the kings palace at the center. There is a
  single street, starting at kings palace and built like a spiral, touching
  the houses 1, 2, 3 ... sequentially. The following picture shows the first
  few houses and the street in heavy dark line.</p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText2><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText2 align=center style='text-align:center'><img width=228 height=235
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/110/p11092.gif" ></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Alice lives in house A and Bob
  lived in house B. When <st1:City><st1:place>Alice</st1:place></st1:City>
  wants to visit Bob, since she is afraid of the dark, she sticks to the road.
  When Bob wants to visit <st1:City><st1:place>Alice</st1:place></st1:City>, he
  walks straight to <st1:City><st1:place>Alice</st1:place></st1:City>s home.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:5'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:6'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>On each line, there will be a
  pair of integers, <b>A</b> and <b>B</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:7'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:8'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input, print
  the distance covered by Alice and Bob respectively, with three digits after
  decimal point.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:9'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:10'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>-<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>0
  &#8804; A, B &#8804; 10<sup>7<o:p></o:p></sup></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:5.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:11'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
  Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
  for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:12'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1 2<br>
  1 3<br>
  1 4<br>
  1 7<br>
  1 8<br>
  1 9</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1.000 1.000<br>
  2.000 1.732<br>
  3.000 2.000<br>
  6.000 1.000<br>
  7.000 1.000<br>
  8.000 1.000</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:14.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:13'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:6.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:14;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:
  Arial'>Problemsetter: Mushfiqur Rouf</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoHeader align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>P </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'>0 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333399'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FFCC00'>6</span></b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.5pt;font-family:Arial;
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem J: Just Finish it up</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:4'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>Along
  a circular track, there are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> gas
  stations, which are numbered clockwise from<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'> 1</b> up to <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>. At station
  <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b>, there are <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>p­<sub>i</sub></b> gallons of petrol available. To race from station <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i </b>to its clockwise neighbor one need<b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> q<sub>i</sub></b> gallons of petrol.
  Consider a race where a car will start the race with an empty fuel tank. Your
  task is to find whether the car can complete the race from any of the
  stations or not. If it can then mention the smallest possible station <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i</b> from which the lap can be
  completed.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:5'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span
  style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:6'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>First
  line of the input contains one integer <b>T</b> the number of test cases.
  Each test case will start with a line containing one integer <b>N</b>, which
  denotes the number of gas stations. In the next few lines contain <b>2*N</b>
  integers. First <b>N</b> integers denote the values of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>p­<sub>i</sub></b>s (petrol available at station <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'>i</b>), subsequent <b>N</b> integers denote the value of <b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>q­<sub>i</sub></b>s (amount of patrol
  needed to go to the next station in the clockwise direction).</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:7'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:8'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>For
  each test case, output the case number in the format <b>Case c: </b>, where
  <b>c</b> is the case number starting form 1.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
  </span>Then display whether it is possible to complete a lap by a car with an
  empty tank or not. If it is not possible to complete the lap then display <b>Not
  possible</b>. If possible, then display <b>Possible from station X</b>,
  where <b>X</b> is the first possible station from which the car can complete
  the lap.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:9'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:10'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>-<span
  style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>T &lt; 25<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>-<span
  style='mso-tab-count:1'>           </span><b>N &lt; 100001<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:11'>
  <td width="35%" valign=top style='width:35.08%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <h1>Sample Input</h1>
  </td>
  <td width="64%" valign=top style='width:64.92%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:12'>
  <td width="35%" valign=top style='width:35.08%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 2 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 10 1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 2 2 2 2 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="64%" valign=top style='width:64.92%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 1: Not possible<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Case 2: Possible from station 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:13'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:14;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter: </span></b><st1:State><st1:place><b><span
    style='font-family:Arial'>Md.</span></b></st1:place></st1:State><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Bahlul Haider<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Judge Solution: Istiaque Ahmed</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>

<link rel="Edit-Time-Data" href="http://acm.uva.es/p/v106/d_files/editdata.mso"><title>Problem A - Continents</title>
<style>
<!--

	{mso-gram-e:yes;}

<meta name="description" content="Exponentiation">
<meta name="keywords" content="htmlatex">
<meta name="resource-type" content="document">
<meta name="distribution" content="global"></head>


<body style="  bgcolor="white" lang="EN-US" link="blue" vlink="blue">

<div class="Section1">

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center"><b style=" ><span style="font-size: 28pt; font-family: Arial;">Problem 
A</span></b><span style="font-family: Arial;"><br>
<b><span style="font-size: 20pt">Continents</span></b></span><b style=" ><span style="font-size: 20pt; font-family: Arial;"> </span></b><span style="font-size: 20pt; font-family: Arial;"><br>
</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"><b style=" >Time Limit: </b>
<span style=" >1</span> Second</span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Mijid the Great is the king of Dodars 
territory. He likes to travel between the cities in his territory and actually, you 
can never see him in the same city as where he was the day before. Therefore, he 
captured all territories of his continent! In spite of this fact, he has seen 
all cities of his territory so far and wants to capture another continent in order to have 
some choices to travel into new cities. Now, having the world map, he needs your 
help to find the biggest continent except the one in which he resides.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Maps are given as <b>M x N</b> tables, 
filled with at most two different letters denoting land and water regions. A 
continent is a set of connected land regions which is completely surrounded by 
water regions or the end of map. Two regions are assumed to be connected if they 
have an edge in common. The coordinates of 
top left region is <b>(0,0)</b> and bottom right region <b>(M-1,N-1)</b>. Region 
with coordinates <b>(x,N-1)</b> should be assumed to&nbsp; have a common 
edge with region <b>(x,0)</b> for every x between <b>0</b> and <b>M-1 </b>(inclusive).</p>

<h1 style=" ><span class="StyleArial16pt"><span style="font-family: Arial;">Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h1>

<p style="text-align: justify;">There will be several test cases. Each test case 
contains two integers <b>M&lt;=20</b> and <b>N&lt;=20</b> in the first line denoting the 
number of rows and columns in the map respectively. Next, there will be <b>M</b> 
lines of exactly <b>N</b> characters representing the map. Finally in the last line there 
would be two integers <b>0&lt;=X&lt;M</b>&nbsp;and <b>0&lt;=Y&lt;N</b> , the 
coordinates 
of the region in which Mijid the Great currently stays. There will one blank 
line after each test case.</p>

<h1 style=" ><span class="StyleArial16pt"><span style="font-family: Arial;">Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></h1>

<p style="text-align: justify;">For each test case, output a line containing an 
integer that is the number of regions in the biggest continent that Mijid the 
Great can capture.</p>

<h1><span style="font-family: Arial; color: black;">Sample Input<span style=" >&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table style="border: medium none ; background: rgb(204, 204, 204) none repeat scroll 0%; width: 6.7in; -moz-background-clip: initial; -moz-background-origin: initial; -moz-background-inline-policy: initial; border-collapse: collapse;" bgcolor="#cccccc" border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="643">
 <tbody><tr style=" >
  <td style="border: 0.5pt solid windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 239.4pt;" valign="top" width="319"><pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>5 5</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>wwwww</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>wwllw</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>wwwww</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>wllww</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>wwwww</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>1 3</b></span></pre>
	<pre>&nbsp;</pre>
	</td>
  <td style="border-left:medium none -moz-use-text-color; border-right:0.5pt solid windowtext; border-top:0.5pt solid windowtext; border-bottom:0.5pt solid windowtext; width: 243pt; padding-left:5.4pt; padding-right:5.4pt; padding-top:0in; padding-bottom:0in" valign="top" width="324">
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>2</b></span></pre>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>


<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center">

<hr align="center" size="2" width="100%">

</div>

<font face="Arial, Times New Roman">
<b>Problem setter: Hossein Azizpour</b></font></div>

<p><b><font face="Arial, Times New Roman" style="font-size: 10pt">1st Amirkabir 
UT Annual Programming Contest&nbsp; Qualification Round</font></b></p>

</body></html>

11095||||||false||||||
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
<html><head><title>Problem B - Tabriz City</title>
<style>
<!--
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
h1
	{margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold; margin-left:0in; margin-right:0in; margin-top:0in}
div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	margin-left:0in; margin-right:0in; margin-top:0in}
-->
</style>
</head>
<body>
<basefont face="ARIAL"><p>
</p><center><b><font style="font-size: 28pt">Problem</font><font size="6"> </font>
<font style="font-size: 28pt">B</font></b><br>
<font style="font-size: 20pt"><b>Tabriz City</b></font><br>
<font size="3"><b>Time Limit:</b> 6 seconds</font></center><p></p>
<p align="right"><table border="0"><tbody><tr><td><small>
<i>I'm from Tabriz! &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</i>
</small></td></tr></tbody></table><tt>Hadi Moshayedi<br></tt>
</p>
<p class="paragraph">Sattar Khan, the governor of Tabriz, wants to make
tourist information centers in some junctions of the city. He wants to
do this in a way that at least one of two junctions at the end of each
street have a tourist information center. He asked Hadi to decide
which junctions should have tourist information centers so the least
number of tourist information centers are built. Hadi asks you to help him! Please
    note that Tabriz has neither more than one street between two distinct junctions
    nor a street from a junction to itself.</p>
<p class="paragraph"><font face="Arial" style="font-size: 16pt"><b>Input<br>
</b></font><br>
The first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N </b>(at most 20).
<b>N</b> test cases will follow. Each one starts with two lines
containing the number of junctions 
<b>n</b><strong>&lt;<nobr>=30</nobr></strong>, and number of streets of the city <strong>m</strong>. Each of next <strong>m </strong>lines contains two numbers: <strong>si</strong> and <strong>ti </strong>(0&lt;=si, ti &lt; n)  indicating that there is a street between <strong>si</strong>-th
    junction and <strong>ti</strong>-th junction. </p>
<p class="paragraph">
<font face="Arial" style="font-size: 16pt"><b>Output<br>
</b></font><br>
For each test case, your program must output the line containing "Case #<b>x</b>:
    ",
followed
by minimum number of tourist information centers which should be built.
Next line must contain the list of junctions in which a tourist
information center should be built. As there might be many valid
solutions, your program can print any of them. In the case there was no junction selected, output a blankline as the second line of testcase output. </p>
<p>
</p>
<div class="Section1">

<h1><span style="font-family: Arial; color: black;">Sample Input<span style=" >&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table style="border: medium none ; background: rgb(204, 204, 204) none repeat scroll 0%; width: 6.7in; -moz-background-clip: initial; -moz-background-origin: initial; -moz-background-inline-policy: initial; border-collapse: collapse;" bgcolor="#cccccc" border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="643" id="table1">
 <tbody><tr style=" >
  <td style="border: 0.5pt solid windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 239.4pt;" valign="top" width="319">
	<font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700">2<br>5<br>4<br>0 3<br>3 1<br>1 4<br>2 4<br><br>2<br>1<br>0 1</font></td>
  <td style="border-left:medium none -moz-use-text-color; border-right:0.5pt solid windowtext; border-top:0.5pt solid windowtext; border-bottom:0.5pt solid windowtext; width: 243pt; padding-left:5.4pt; padding-right:5.4pt; padding-top:0in; padding-bottom:0in" valign="top" width="324">
	<pre style="tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Courier New; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt"><b>Case #1: 2<br>3 4<br>Case #2: 1<br>0</b></pre>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>


<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center">

<hr align="center" size="2" width="100%">

</div>

<font face="Arial, Times New Roman">
<b>Problem setter: Hadi Moshayedi</b></font></div>

<p><b><font face="Arial, Times New Roman" style="font-size: 10pt">1st Amirkabir 
UT Annual Programming Contest&nbsp; Qualification Round</font></b></p>

</style>
<meta name="description" content="Exponentiation">
<meta name="keywords" content="htmlatex">
<meta name="resource-type" content="document">
<meta name="distribution" content="global"></head>


<body style="  bgcolor="white" lang="EN-US" link="blue" vlink="blue">

<div class="Section1">

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center"><b style=" ><span style="font-size: 28pt; font-family: Arial;">Problem 
C</span></b><span style="font-family: Arial;"><br>
<span class="style1">Nails</span></span><span style="font-size: 20pt; font-family: Arial;"><br>
</span><b style=" ><span style="font-family: Arial;">Time Limit: </span></b>
<span style="font-family: Arial">1</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> Second</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:left;direction:ltr;unicode-bidi:embed"> 
Arash is tired of hard working, so he wants to surround some nails on the wall 
of his room by a rubber ribbon to make fun of it! Now, he wants to know what 
will be the final length of the rubber ribbon after surrounding the nails. You 
must assume that the radius of nails and rubber ribbon is negligible.</p>
<h1 style=" >&nbsp;</h1>
<h1 style=" ><span class="StyleArial16pt"><span style="font-family: Arial;">Input</span></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
<span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial"><br>
The first line of input gives the number of cases, <strong>N</strong>. <b>N</b> 
test cases will follow. Each test case starts with a line containing two 
integers, the initial length of rubber ribbon and the number of nails <b>0&lt;</b><strong>n</strong><b>&lt;=100,</b> 
respectively. Each of next <strong>n </strong>lines contains two integers denoting the location of 
a nail. 
There will be a blank line after each test-case. </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">&nbsp;</p>

<h1 style=" ><span class="StyleArial16pt"><span style="font-family: Arial;">Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
<span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial"><br>
Your program must
</span>output the final length of rubber ribbon precise to 5 decimal digits. </p>

<h1><span style="font-family: Arial; color: black;"><br>
Sample Input<span style=" >&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table style="border: medium none ; background: rgb(204, 204, 204) none repeat scroll 0%; width: 6.7in; -moz-background-clip: initial; -moz-background-origin: initial; -moz-background-inline-policy: initial; border-collapse: collapse;" bgcolor="#cccccc" border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="643">
 <tbody><tr style=" >
  <td style="border: 0.5pt solid windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 239.4pt;" valign="top" width="319">
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">2</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">2 4</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">0 0</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">0 1</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">

	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">1 1</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">&nbsp;</p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">5 4</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">0 0</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">0 1</span></p>
	<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left; text-autospace: none; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed">
	<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-weight: 700">1 0</span></p>

	<font face="Courier New"><b>4.00000<br>
	5.00000</b></font></td>
 </tr>

<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center">

<hr align="center" size="2" width="100%">

</div>

<b>Problem setter: </b></font><b><font face="Arial, Times New Roman">Ali

<body style="  bgcolor="white" lang="EN-US" link="blue" vlink="blue">

<div class="Section1">

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center"><b style=" ><span style="font-size: 28pt; font-family: Arial;">Problem 
D</span></b><span style="font-family: Arial;"><br>
</span><span style="font-size: 20pt"><b><span style="font-family: Arial">Poor 
My Problem!
    :-(</span></b></span><b style=" ><span style="font-size: 20pt; font-family: Arial;"> </span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><b style=" >Time Limit: </b>
<span style=" >8</span> Seconds</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;" dir="ltr">
    To find out what the story of my poor problem is, send an e-mail to [my last name]
    at gmail.com! :-D</p>
    <p dir="ltr" style="text-align: justify">
        Given the description of a graph, find 
the minimum-cost path between a source and some targets having the following considerations in mind:</p>
    <ul>
<li style="text-align: justify;" dir="ltr">The path can contain at most 1000 edges.</li>
        <li dir="ltr" style="text-align: justify">An edge may be used more than one time in
            the path.</li>
        <li dir="ltr" style="text-align: justify">Edges are uni-directional,</li>
        <li dir="ltr" style="text-align: justify">A path cost is defined as the sum of its edge
            costs divided by the 
number of edges in the path.</li>
    </ul>

<h1 style=" ><span class="StyleArial16pt"><span style="font-family: Arial;">Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h1>

<p style="text-align: justify;" dir="ltr">There will be several test cases, each starting with three integers in the first line&nbsp; <b>0 &lt; v &lt;= &nbsp;600, 0 &lt;= e &lt;= 3600, 0 &lt;= s &lt; v</b> <b>&nbsp;</b>which are respectively the number of 
vertices, the number of edges and the source vertex.
    Each of the next <b>e</b> lines contains three integers <b>0 &lt;= v1 &lt; v, 0 &lt;= v2 &lt; v, 0 &lt;= c &lt;= 100000,
</b>which means that there is an edge from vertex <strong>v1</strong> to vertex <strong>v2</strong> with cost <strong>c</strong>.
    Then, there will be an integer <b>q</b> which denotes the number of queries 
followed by <strong>q</strong> integers each between <b>0</b> and <b>v-1 </b>(inclusive).</p>

<h1 style=" ><span class="StyleArial16pt"><span style="font-family: Arial;">Output<o:p></o:p></span></span></h1>

<p style="text-align: justify;">For each test case, you must print <b>
q</b> lines, each of them consisting two numbers, that are cost of the minimum path from vertex <b>s</b> to 
corresponding query vertex rounded to four decimal digits, and number of edges in the minimum path. In the case there is no 
path between them, your program must print &quot;No Path&quot; (without quotations).
Print a blank line after each test case.<b> </b>If there are more than one minimum path print out the one with minimum 
number of edges.</p>

<h1><span style="font-family: Arial; color: black;">Sample Input<span style=" >&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table style="border: medium none ; background: rgb(204, 204, 204) none repeat scroll 0%; width: 6.7in; -moz-background-clip: initial; -moz-background-origin: initial; -moz-background-inline-policy: initial; border-collapse: collapse;" bgcolor="#cccccc" border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="643">
 <tbody><tr style=" >
  <td style="border: 0.5pt solid windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 239.4pt;" valign="top" width="319"><pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>3 2 0</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>0 1 100</b></span></pre><pre>
<!--[if !supportEmptyParas]--><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>1 2 200</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>3</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>0</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>1</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>2</b></span></pre>
	<pre>&nbsp;</pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>5 5 0</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>0 1 3</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>1 2 4</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>2 3 5</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>2 4 6</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>4 3 1</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>2</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>2</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>3</b></span></pre></td>
  <td style="border-style: solid solid solid none; border-color: windowtext windowtext windowtext -moz-use-text-color; border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt medium; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 243pt;" valign="top" width="324">
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>0.0000 0</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>100.0000 1</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>150.0000 2</b></span></pre>
	<pre>&nbsp;</pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>3.5000 2</b></span></pre>
	<pre><span style="font-size: 11pt"><b>3.5000 4</b></span></pre>
	<pre>&nbsp;</pre>
  </td>
 </tr>
</tbody></table>


<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;" align="center">

<hr align="center" size="2" width="100%">

</div>

<font face="Arial, Times New Roman">
<b>Problem setter: Hossein Azizpour</b></font><p><b>
<font face="Arial, Times New Roman" style="font-size: 10pt">1st Amirkabir UT

<html xmlns:v="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml"
xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office"
xmlns:w="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word"
xmlns:st1="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40">

<head>
<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=us-ascii">
<meta name=ProgId content=Word.Document>
<meta name=Generator content="Microsoft Word 11">
<meta name=Originator content="Microsoft Word 11">
<link rel=Edit-Time-Data href="battle_files/editdata.mso">
<title>Problem E - Battle II</title>
<o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"
 name="City"/>
<o:SmartTagType namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags"
 name="place"/>
<style>
<!--
 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p
	{font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
pre
	{margin-top:0in;
	margin-bottom:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
tt
	{font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.paragraph, li.paragraph, div.paragraph
	{mso-style-name:paragraph;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in 1.25in 1.0in 1.25in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in' dir="ltr">

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b>
<span
style='font-size:28pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem </span></b>
<span style="font-size: 28pt; font-family: Arial"><b>E</b><br>
</span><st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on"><b>
<span style='font-size:20pt;
  font-family:Arial'>Battle</span></b></st1:place></st1:City><b><span
style='font-size:20pt;font-family:Arial'> II </span></b>
<span style="font-size: 20pt; font-family: Arial"><br>
</span><span style='font-family:Arial'><b>Time Limit:</b> 6 seconds</span></p>
<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>
<span style='font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&quot;Marriage, in life, is like a duel
  in the<br>
  midst of the battle</span></i><i><span style='font-size:7.5pt'>&quot;</span></i></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align=right style='text-align:right'><st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on"><tt><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'>Edmond</span></tt></st1:place></st1:City><tt><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'> About</span></tt><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style="text-align: justify"><st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Daltons</st1:place></st1:City>
(Daida, Alhar, Tara, and Reyton) love playing games.
One of their favorite games is 'Battle II'. In order to play this game, first,
one of them is chosen as a problem-setter. The problem-setter starts drawing
some bombs on a piece of paper (each bomb is a circle: has a center and a radius). She then associates to each bomb a destruction
range. There are three rules defined in this game:
</div>
    <span style="font-family: Arial">
        <div class=Section1>
            <ol>
            <li class=paragraph style="text-align: justify">

   If a bomb explodes, all the bombs in its destruction range will also explode. A bomb <strong>b1</strong> is in destruction
                range of&nbsp; another bomb <strong>b2</strong> if distance of <strong>b2 </strong>
                from the perimeter of <strong>b1</strong> is less than the range of&nbsp; <strong>b1</strong>.
                (i.e. <strong>b2.range </strong>+ <strong>b1.radius </strong>+ <strong>b2.radius </strong>
                >= <strong>Distance</strong>(<strong>b1.center</strong>, <strong>b2.center</strong>))
            </li>
                <li class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">A bomb may explode due to either being affected by explosion of another bomb
      according to the first rule or manually being fired. </li>
                <li class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">Firing a bomb manually has a cost which is equal to the range of it. </li>
            </ol>
            <p class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">
     
She finally gives the configuration of the bombs to the others and asks them
to find a sequence of bombs to fire which should satisfy the following conditions:
            </p>
            <ol>
            <li class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">

   All the bombs should be exploded as a result of firing and explosion of 
      the bombs in this sequence.&nbsp;</li>
                <li class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">The <b><i>i</i></b>th bomb in the sequence should not result explosion of
      the <b><i>j</i></b>th bomb where <strong>j </strong>&gt; <strong>i</strong>.&nbsp;</li>
                <li class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">The <strong>average</strong> cost of firing the bombs that are in the sequence must be minimum. </li>
            </ol>
            <p class="paragraph" style="text-align: justify">&nbsp;
      
You should help the players find the solution to this problem by writing a
program which is able to find such a sequence given the specifications and
configuration of the bombs in the paper.
                </p>


<p class=paragraph style="text-align: justify"><font face="Arial"><b><span style='font-size:16pt;'>Input</span></b></font><br>
<br>
The first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N</b>. <b>N</b> test
cases will
    follow. Each one starts with a line containing the number of bombs (<nobr>0&lt;<B>n</B>&lt;=300</nobr>).
Each of&nbsp; the next <strong>n </strong>lines
contains four integers Xi, Yi, Ri, Ei, meaning that the i-th bomb is located at (Xi, Yi), has a radius of Ri, and has a range of Ei. 
There will be a blank line after each block of test case.</p>

<p class=paragraph style="text-align: justify"><font face="Arial"><b><span style='font-size:16pt;'>Output</span></b></font><br>
<br>
For each test case, output the line containing &quot;Case #<b>x</b>:&quot;,
followed by  list of bombs in the order that should be fired, seperated by a single space. Follow the output format
used in sample output. If there are more than one solution, any of them is acceptable.
<o:p></o:p></p>

</div>
    </span>

<div class="Section1">

<h1><span style="font-family: Arial; color: black;"><span style="font-size: 16pt">Sample Input<span style=" >&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h1>

<table style="border: medium none ; background: rgb(204, 204, 204) none repeat scroll 0%; width: 6.7in; -moz-background-clip: initial; -moz-background-origin: initial; -moz-background-inline-policy: initial; border-collapse: collapse;" bgcolor="#cccccc" border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="643" id="table1">
 <tbody><tr style=" >
  <td style="border: 0.5pt solid windowtext; padding: 0in 5.4pt; width: 239.4pt;" valign="top" width="319">
	<pre style="tab-stops: 45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt; font-family: Courier New; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt"><b><font size="3">1</font></b></pre>

4 7 2 2
8 5 1 0
3 -3 1 1</font></b></pre>
