<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset 1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
   style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;background:#0060F0;border:solid white 1.5pt;
   mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in;mso-border-insideh:1.5pt solid white;
   mso-border-insidev:1.5pt solid white'>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:19.5pt'>
    <td width="20%" rowspan=2 style='width:20.0%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Arial Black";
    color:#00CCFF'>D</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="57%" style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
    height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    color:#00CCFF'>Next Generation Contest 3</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="22%" rowspan=2 style='width:22.38%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b><span style='color:#00CCFF'>Time Limit: 2 seconds</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
    <td width="57%" valign=bottom style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#00CCFF'>Dynamic Frog</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11157.jpg"  align=right v:shapes="_x0000_s1026">With
the increased use of pesticides, the local streams and rivers have become so
contaminated that it has become almost impossible for the aquatic animals to
survive. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Frog Fred is on the left bank of such a river. <b>N</b>
rocks are arranged in a straight line from the left bank to the right bank. The
distance between the left and the right bank is <b>D</b> meters. There are
rocks of two sizes. The bigger ones can withstand any weight but the smaller
ones start to drown as soon as any mass is placed on it. Fred has to go to the
right bank where he has to collect a gift and return to the left bank where his
home is situated.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>He can land on every small rock at most one time,
but can use the bigger ones as many times as he likes. He can never touch the
polluted water as it is extremely contaminated.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Can you plan the itinerary so that the maximum
distance of a single leap is minimized?</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=bigfont style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The first line of input is an integer </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>T(T&lt;100)</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> that indicates
the number of test cases. Each case starts with a line containing two integers </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>N(0</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>&#8804;N&#8804;100)</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>and </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>D(1</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>&#8804;D&#8804;1000000000)</span></b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>. </span>The next line gives the description
of the <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b> stones. Each
stone is defined by <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>S-M</span></b>. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>S</span></b>
indicates the type <span class=GramE>Big(</span><b><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>B</span></b>) or Small(<b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>S</span></b>)
and <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b>(<b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>0&lt;</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>M&lt;D)</span></b>
determines the distance of that stone from the left bank. The stones will be
given in increasing order of<b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'> M</span></b>.</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Output</span></span></h5>

<p class=bigfont><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>For every case, output the case number followed by the minimized maximum
leap.</span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='mso-cellspacing:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:107.25pt'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:107.25pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>B-5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>S-5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>2 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>B-3 S-6<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:107.25pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 1: 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case </span></b><st1:time
  Minute="10" Hour="14"><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
   style='font-size:12.0pt'>2: 10</span></b></st1:time><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 3: 7<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in;
mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=jbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'>Problem Setter: Sohel Hafiz<br>
Special Thanks: Jane Alam Jan</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset 1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
   style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;background:#0060F0;border:solid white 1.5pt;
   mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in;mso-border-insideh:1.5pt solid white;
   mso-border-insidev:1.5pt solid white'>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:19.5pt'>
    <td width="20%" rowspan=2 style='width:20.0%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Arial Black";
    color:#00CCFF'>E</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="57%" style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
    height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    color:#00CCFF'>Next Generation Contest 3</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="22%" rowspan=2 style='width:22.38%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b><span style='color:#00CCFF'>Time Limit: 2 seconds</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
    <td width="57%" valign=bottom style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#00CCFF'>Elegant Permuted Sum</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=jbfont>You will be given <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>n</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> integers &lt;</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>A<sub>1</sub>A<sub>2</sub>A<sub>3</sub>...A<sub>n</sub></span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&gt;. Find a permutation of these </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'>n</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>
integers so that summation of the absolute differences between adjacent
elements is maximized.<br>
<br>
Suppose </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>n</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>=</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>4</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> and the given integers are <b>&lt;</b></span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>4</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>2</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>1</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>5</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&gt;</span></b><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>. The permutation <b>&lt;</b></span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>2</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>5</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>1</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>4</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&gt;</span></b><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> yields the maximum summation.<br>
For this permutation </span><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'>sum</span></b><b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:
EN'>=</span></b><b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>abs(2-5)</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>+</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>abs(5-1)</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>+</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>abs(1-4)</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>=</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>3+4+3</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>=</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> </span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>10</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>.<br>
Of all the </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>24</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> permutations, you wont get any summation
whose value exceeds </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>10</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>. We will call this value, </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'>10</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>,
the <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>elegant permuted sum</i>.</span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=jbfont><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>The first line of
input is an integer </span><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'>T(T&lt;100)</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN'> that represents the number of test cases. Each case consists of a line
that starts with </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>n</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> (</span></b><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>1&lt;n&lt;51</span></b><b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>)</span></b><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> followed by </span><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>n</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'> non-negative integers separated by a single
space. None of the elements of the given permutation will exceed </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>1000</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>.</span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Output</span></span></h5>

<p class=jbfont><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>For each case,
output the case number followed by the <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>elegant
permuted summation.</i></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='mso-cellspacing:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:72.6pt'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:72.6pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>4 <span
  class=SpellE>4</span> 2 1 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>4 1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>2 10 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:72.6pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case </span></b><st1:time Minute="10" Hour="13"><b
   style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1: 10</span></b></st1:time><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 2: 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 3: 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in;
mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=jbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>Problem
Setter: Sohel Hafiz<br>
Special Thanks: Jane Alam Jan</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset 1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
   style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;background:#0060F0;border:solid white 1.5pt;
   mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in;mso-border-insideh:1.5pt solid white;
   mso-border-insidev:1.5pt solid white'>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:19.5pt'>
    <td width="20%" rowspan=2 style='width:20.0%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Arial Black";
    color:#00CCFF'>F</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="57%" style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
    height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    color:#00CCFF'>Next Generation Contest 3</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="22%" rowspan=2 style='width:22.38%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b><span style='color:#00CCFF'>Time Limit: 2 seconds</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
    <td width="57%" valign=bottom style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#00CCFF'>Factors and Multiples</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You will be given two sets of
integers. Lets call them set <span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b> and</span> set <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>B</span></b>.
Set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b>
contains <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>n</span></b>
elements and set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>B</span></b> contains <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>m</span></b> elements. You have to remove <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>k<sub>1</sub></span></b>
elements from set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>k<sub>2</sub></span></b>
elements from set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>B</span></b> so that of the remaining values
no integer in set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>B</span></b> is a multiple of any integer in
set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b>.
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>k<sub>1</sub></span></b>
should be in the range <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>[0,n]</span></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>k<sub>2</sub></span></b> in the
range <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>[0,m]</span></b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You have to find the value of <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>(k<sub>1</sub>+<span
class=GramE>k<sub>2</sub></span>)</span></b> such that <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>(k<sub>1</sub>+k<sub>2</sub>)</span></b>
is as low as possible.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>P</span></b> is a multiple of<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Q</span></b> if there is some integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>K</span></b>
such that <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>P</span>
</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>=</span>
</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>K</span>
</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>*</span>
</b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Q</span>.</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11159.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Suppose set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>A</b> is <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>{2,3,4,5}</span></b> and set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>B</b> is <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>{6,7,8,9}</span></b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>.</span>
By removing <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>2</span></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3</span></b> from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>8</span></b>
from <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>B</span></b>,
we get the sets <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>{4<span class=GramE>,5</span>}</span></b> and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>{6,7,9</span>}</b>.
Here none of the integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6</span></b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>7</span></b> or <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>9</span></b>
is a multiple of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>4</span></b> or<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>5</span></b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>So for this case the answer is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3</span></b>
(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></b>
from set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>A</span></b>
and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></b>
from set <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>B</span></b>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input is an
integer <span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>T(</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>T&lt;50)</span></b> that
determine the number of test cases. Each case consists of two lines. The first
line starts with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>n</span></b> followed by <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>n</span></b> integers. The second line starts
with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>m</span></b>
followed by <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>m</span></b> integers. Both <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>n</span></b> and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>m</span></b> will be in the
range <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>[1,100]</span></b>.
All the elements of the two sets will fit in <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>32</span></b> bit signed
integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Output</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>For each case, output the
case number followed by the answer.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='mso-cellspacing:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:84.75pt'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:84.75pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>4 2 3 4 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>4 6 7 8 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>3 100 200 300<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1 150<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:84.75pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 1: 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 2: 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in;
mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=jbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>Problem
Setter: Sohel Hafiz<br>
Special Thanks: Jane Alam Jan</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset 1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
   style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;background:#0060F0;border:solid white 1.5pt;
   mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in;mso-border-insideh:1.5pt solid white;
   mso-border-insidev:1.5pt solid white'>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:19.5pt'>
    <td width="20%" rowspan=2 style='width:20.0%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Arial Black";
    color:#00CCFF'>G</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="57%" style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
    height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    color:#00CCFF'>Next Generation Contest 3</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="22%" rowspan=2 style='width:22.38%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b><span style='color:#00CCFF'>Time Limit: 3 seconds</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
    <td width="57%" valign=bottom style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#00CCFF'>Going Together</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are playing a computer game
in which three robots (Aneed, Ben and Cindy) are trapped in a labyrinth.
Initially all three are situated in three different locations in the maze. There
are three outlets through which the robots have to exit. As expected, there are
several obstacles in the maze and the robots can't go through them.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The maze can be modeled as a
square grid with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>N X N</span></b> cells. The robots are placed on three different
cells into the maze. You can command them to move. A single command will be
activated for the three robots simultaneously. A robot will move to a new
position if it is an empty cell within the maze or it is one of the target
cells, otherwise the command will be ignored for that robot. Your task is to
command them such a way that all of them are on three exit cells (in any
order).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11160.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>A move consists of one of the following (Each move takes 1
unit of time):</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Move North</i></p>
  </td>
  <td width=271 valign=top style='width:203.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The robots move one cell north.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Move East</i></p>
  </td>
  <td width=271 valign=top style='width:203.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The robots move one cell east.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Move South</i></p>
  </td>
  <td width=271 valign=top style='width:203.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The robots move one cell south.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Move West</i></p>
  </td>
  <td width=271 valign=top style='width:203.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The robots move one cell west.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each cell consists of one of the
following characters:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>A  Initial position of Aneed</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>B  Initial position of Ben</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>C  Initial position of Cindy</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>.  An empty cell</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'># - An obstacle</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>X  A target cell</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You can assume that for every
maze each of the letters (<span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>A
B C</span>) will appear exactly once and the letter <span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>X</span> will appear exactly 3 times.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=bigfont style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The first line of input is an integer, </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>T(T&lt;50)</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>, that indicates
the number of test cases. Each case starts with an integer </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>N(2&lt;N&lt;10)</span></b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>.</span><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each of the next </span><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>N</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> lines contain </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>N</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> characters each
that fills up the maze.</span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Output</span></span></h5>

<p class=bigfont style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each case, output the case number followed by
the minimum time required. If it is impossible to move them as described, print
</span><b><span lang=EN style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'></span></b><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-ansi-language:EN'>trapped</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> instead of the time.</span><o:p></o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='mso-cellspacing:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=226 valign=top style='width:169.45pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=352 valign=top style='width:264.05pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:247.65pt'>
  <td width=226 valign=top style='width:169.45pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:247.65pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>7</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>.....#.</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>.......</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>.#B....</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>...A.#.</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>.CX....</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>.X.X.#.</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>.#.....</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>ABC</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>...</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>XXX</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>ABC</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>###</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>XXX<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=352 valign=top style='width:264.05pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:247.65pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 1: 2</span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 2: 2</span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 3: trapped<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in;
mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<p class=jbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN'>Problem Setter: Sohel Hafiz<br>
Figure Drawing &amp; Alternate Solution: Jane Alam Jan</span></b></p>

<p><b>Note:</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>The first case corresponds to the above picture.</b> </p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset 1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
   style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;background:#0060F0;border:solid white 1.5pt;
   mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in;mso-border-insideh:1.5pt solid white;
   mso-border-insidev:1.5pt solid white'>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:19.5pt'>
    <td width="20%" rowspan=2 style='width:20.0%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Arial Black";
    color:#00CCFF'>H</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="57%" style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
    height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    color:#00CCFF'>Next Generation Contest 3</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="22%" rowspan=2 style='width:22.38%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b><span style='color:#00CCFF'>Time Limit: 3 seconds</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
    <td width="57%" valign=bottom style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#00CCFF'>Help My Brother (II)</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A Fibonacci sequence is
calculated by adding the previous two members of the sequence, with the first
two members being both <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></b>.<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i>f</i> (1) = 1, <i>f</i>
(2) = 1, <i>f</i> (<i>n</i> &gt; 2) = <i>f</i> (<i>n</i> - 1) + <i>f</i> (<i>n</i>
- 2)<o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Little Tuhin is playing with Fibonacci numbers.
He took a paper and began to write non-negative integers such that every <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>nth</span></b>
line contains a total of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i>f</i> (n)</b>
numbers. He noted the median of the lines.<o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>He came to me with a confused smile. He told me, &quot;I
think I have found a formula to find the median of a certain line, but I am not
sure about my formula. Can you write a code for me? I will give a line number
and you have to tell me the median of that line.&quot;<o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>His paper is noted below:<o:p></o:p></p>

<pre style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'>0<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                  </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>        </span>Median: 0</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                          </span>Median: 1</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>2 3<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                        </span>Median: 2</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>4 5 6<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                      </span>Median: 5</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>7 8 9 10 11<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                </span>Median: 9</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>12 13 14 15 16 17 18 19<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span>Median: 15</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>...</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre>

<p style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>If
there are <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>n</span></b> numbers in a
certain line then<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11161.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"></span><o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>My
computer is not working well. So, I cannot help him right now. Can anyone help
me with the code?<o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
input file contains several sets of inputs. The total number of sets will
be less than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>100</span></b>. The description of each set is given below:<o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Each
set starts with one integer <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>n (1
&#8804; n &#8804; 1500)</span></b> which indicates the line number.<o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
input will be terminated by the set where <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>n
= 0</span></b>. And this set should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Output</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>For each set in the input,
you should first print the set number starting from </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>1</span></b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>. And the next line should
be the median of the nth line. You can assume that the output will fit into </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'>350</span></b><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'> digits.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>See
the sample input-output for more details. Output should be formatted like the
sample output.<o:p></o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='mso-cellspacing:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:181.95pt'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:181.95pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:181.95pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>Set 1:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Set 2:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Set 3:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Set 4:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Set 5:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Set 6:<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>15<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;

<p class=jbfont style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>Problem
Setter: Jane Alam Jan<br>
Special Thanks: Sohel Hafiz</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

<head>

<title>I :: Independent Attacking Zones ::</title>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset 1.5pt;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
   style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;background:#0060F0;border:solid white 1.5pt;
   mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in;mso-border-insideh:1.5pt solid white;
   mso-border-insidev:1.5pt solid white'>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:19.5pt'>
    <td width="20%" rowspan=2 style='width:20.0%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='font-size:48.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Arial Black";
    color:#00CCFF'>I</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="57%" style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
    height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    color:#00CCFF'>Next Generation Contest 3</span></b></p>
    </td>
    <td width="22%" rowspan=2 style='width:22.38%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:19.5pt'>
    <p class=cbfont><b><span style='color:#00CCFF'>Time Limit: 2 seconds</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
   <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
    <td width="57%" valign=bottom style='width:57.62%;border:solid white 1.5pt;
    padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
    <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
    style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
    mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:#00CCFF'>Independent Attacking Zones</span></b></p>
    </td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=bigfont style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>A common technique used by invading armies is to
surround a city instead of directly entering it. The armies divided themselves
into platoons having bases in a circular fashion around the city. To take
internal control of the city, platoons are grouped in three to cover triangular
regions. It is a policy of the General to ensure no two triangular regions
overlap. Unfortunately, the process is made a bit trickier because there are
two types of armies in the invading force. The two different armies are known
as <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Red Army</i> and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>Black Army</i>. A platoon consists of one type of army. While the <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Black Army </i>has clear intention to serve
the General but the Red ones might betray if they get an opportunity. It is
decided that every triangular group will consist of at most one Red Army
Platoon so that the Red ones dont dominate in any assignment.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN'>Suppose we have 6 platoons (4 black and 2 red) as shown in the following
figure.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11162a.jpg" 
v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN'>Since there are 6 platoons, we can form 2 groups ( 6 / 3 = 2 ). There are
two possible arrangements for this configuration.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11162a.jpg" 
v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                      </span>
<img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11162a.jpg" 
v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                        
</span>Assignment 1<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                                      </span>Assignment
2</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>Problem: </span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>You will be given the number of platoons
and their colors. You have to find out the number of possible configurations
such that every platoon is part of exactly one group and also meets the above
restrictions.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=bigfont style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The first line of input is an integer </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>T(T&lt;100)</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> that indicates
the number of test cases. Each case consists of two lines. The first line is an
integer </span><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:
EN'>P</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'> </span><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:
EN'>(2&lt;P&lt;40</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> and </span><b><span lang=EN style='font-family:
"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>P</span></b><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> is a multiple of </span><b><span lang=EN
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>3</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>). </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>P</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> represents the
number of platoons. Next line consists of a string of size </span><b><span
lang=EN style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-ansi-language:EN'>P</span></b><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>. Each character
of the string is either R or B. The string gives the position of the
platoons in clockwise order. R indicates red and B indicates black. The
starting position is arbitrarily chosen. So, the example above may be
represented by any of the following: RBBBRB, BBBRBR, BBRBRB, BRBRBB,
RBRBBB or BRBBBR.</span><o:p></o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Garamond;
color:blue'>Output</span></span></h5>

<p class=bigfont style='text-align:justify'><span lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:
EN;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each case, output the case number followed by
the number of valid configurations.</span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='mso-cellspacing:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
  Garamond;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:blue'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:110.85pt'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:110.85pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>RBBBRB<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>BRBRBB<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>9<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>BBBBBBBBB</span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=391 valign=top style='width:293.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;
  height:110.85pt'><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 1: 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case 2: 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Case </span></b><st1:time
  Minute="12" Hour="15"><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
   style='font-size:12.0pt'>3: 12</span></b></st1:time></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:
solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;

</div>

<p class=jbfont><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span lang=EN
