<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Deal or No Deal</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Deal
or No Deal</span></i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>
is a TV game show that originated in <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Holland</st1:place></st1:City>,
but now is broadcasted in many countries over the world. It has some variants
in the number of prizes, the number of rounds and the amounts of money that can
be won. Here we will study a typical format. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext'>Initially 15 candidates <span class=SpellE>recieve</span> a
numbered box (number 1 trough 15) with in it each a <span class=SpellE>cheque</span>
for an amount of money between 10 and 500,000 Euro.</span></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'> The boxes are closed and
the different amounts were assigned randomly to the 15 boxes beforehand, so the
candidates don't know which amount is in which box. The game starts when one
candidate is selected to play the game. He takes his box center-stage and then
plays <span class=SpellE>upto</span> 4 rounds. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>In
the first round, the candidate calls out 4 of the 14 remaining numbers (not his
own) and these boxes are opened and the enclosed amounts are displayed. Now it
is sure the candidate's box contains one of the remaining 11 amounts, but not
which. Based on the remaining amounts, the candidate is offered a deal: he can
leave the show with a certain amount of money (the deal), or continue playing
(no deal). If he decides to continue playing, in the second round he has to
appoint 3 more of the remaining boxes (not his own), which are then opened and
the enclosed amounts are shown. Then again a deal is offered based on the
undisclosed amounts, which the candidate can take or leave. In each of the
remaining two rounds (if played), three more boxes are opened and a deal is
offered. If the candidate refuses the final deal when only two boxes are left,
one of which is his own box, he has to open his box and the enclosed amount is
his. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>The
fifteen amounts in the boxes are: 10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000,
10000, 20000, 50000, 100000, 200000 and 500000 Euro. The deal the candidate is
offered in each round is a percentage of the average of the remaining amounts.
In the first round this percentage is low to tease the candidate to continue
playing, but during the following rounds the percentage steadily increases.
Although the actual percentages are unknown to the public, statistical analysis
of previous game shows reveal that they lie around the same values between
shows. Let's take the following values as an example: 10%, 20%, 40% and 80% for
rounds 1 to 4 respectively. To calculate the deals, we break off remainders
after division, so if in some round <b>n</b> boxes remain with a total amount
of <b>S</b> and the percentage is <b>p</b>, then the offer is the integer part
of (<b>S</b>*<b>p</b>)/(100*<b>n</b>). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Let's
illustrate a typical game, where the candidate refuses all deals. It is
depicted in the following table: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Round<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Boxes<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Amounts in Selected Boxes<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Remaining Amounts<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Percentage<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Deal<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>200,
  5000, 20000, 50000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>10,
  20, 50, 100, 500, 1000, 2000, 10000, 100000, 200000, 500000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>7397<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>10,
  50, 2000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>20,
  100, 500, 1000, 10000, 100000, 200000, 500000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>20<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>20278<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>1000,
  200000, 500000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>20,
  100, 500, 10000, 100000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>40<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>8849<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:4;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>20,
  10000, 100000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>100,
  500 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>80<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>240<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>So
the candidate wins either 100 or 500 Euro, with equal chance, while at some
point in the game he could have walked away with about 20,000 Euro. Notice however
that at that point he had a fair chance of winning a (much) higher amount of
money, but eventually the luck was against him. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-style:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>The Problem<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'>As you see, the spread of amounts a candidate can win is
enormous, and during the game he has to make several hazardous decisions. This
makes the game attractive to a lot of people, both to play and to watch. And guess
what: someone you know has been selected to play in the show! Because she's a
clever girl, she wants to play using the following strategy: before the show
she selects a certain limiting amount of money; whenever, during the show, she
is offered that amount or a higher one, she'll take that deal. If all offers
are lower, she will play to the end. Because she is clever, but a bad <span
class=SpellE>statician</span>, she asks your advise. Given a certain limiting
amount she wants you to calculate two values: the probability that she will win
at least this amount of <span class=GramE>money,</span> and the expected amount
she will win when she follows her strategy with this limit. As you know, the
expected outcome of an event is the sum, over all possible events, of the
products of outcome and probability for that particular event.<span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>Several cases,
each consisting of two lines.</span> The first line contains one integer
between 10 and 500000 (inclusive), a limiting amount in Euros for the strategy
described. The second line contains 4 integers between 1 and 200 (inclusive),
the percentages for rounds 1 to 4 respectively. A line containing a zero
terminates the input and should not be processed. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Two numbers per case, separated
by one space, on a line by itself, denoting the probability (between 0.0 and
1.0) and the average amount won (in Euros). A special corrector will tolerate
an absolute error of 10<sup>-6</sup> and 10<sup>-2</sup> for the two values
respectively.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="97%"
 style='width:97.14%;margin-left:5.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.06%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>20000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>10 20 40
  80<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>10 25 50
  100<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>500000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>5 15 55
  105<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.94%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>0.675991
  25507.05<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>1.000000
  5925.43<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>0.066667
  59258.67<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='margin-left:.5in'>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>: <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Joachim <span class=SpellE>Wulff</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: Derek <span
class=SpellE>Kisman</span></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-style:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Epilogue (not needed to solve the
problem)<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The game <i>Deal or No Deal</i>
was originally invented by <span class=SpellE><i>Endemol</i></span><i>
Productions</i> as part of a bigger game show <span class=SpellE><i>Miljoenenjacht</i></span>
(Hunt for the Millions). In this original format the game was played with 26
suitcases and prizes ranging from 0.01 to 5,000,000 Euro. Now the show airs in
more than 30 countries and has <span class=GramE>it's</span> own page in <span
class=SpellE>Wikipedia</span>. <o:p></o:p></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Scientifically the show is interesting to social
scientists and economists, because it gives an opportunity to study human <span
class=SpellE>behaviour</span> under rapidly changing gain/loss situations. <span
class=GramE><b><i>Deal or No Deal?</i></b></span><b><i> Decision Making Under
Risk in a Large-payoff Game Show (Post <span class=SpellE>et.al</span>. 2006)</i></b>
is one such <span class=GramE>study, that</span> concludes that people are more
willing to cut a reasonable deal after they have sustained a big loss. In the
example given in the problem statement, most people would accept the deal in
round 3 after loosing two major opportunities, even though the expected earning
when continuing is more than double the amount of the deal. At the same time,
most people would reject the much higher deal in round 2, because the
perspectives of winning even higher amounts are still reasonable. Our clever
friend in the problem statement would have won at least her limit of 20,000
Euros in about two-thirds of the cases. The situation in the game show is not
much different from real life (Stock Exchange, Job Market, Real Estate, etc.),
although maybe a bit more extreme. <span class=SpellE>Endemol</span> likes to
put people under extreme circumstances; they also created <i>Big Brother</i>
and <i>Fear Factor</i>.<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-style:italic;}

	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;

	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span class=SpellE><span
class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Cos</span></b></span></span><span
class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>(</span></b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>NA)</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Have you ever looked at formulae
of the form <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>Cos</span></span><span
class=GramE>(</span>NA)? If you havent looked at them yet, just look at them
now:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:174.75pt;
 height:57.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/f_files/image003.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=233 height=77
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/f_files/image003.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1232767939">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>These formulae will make you
believe that any <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>Cos</span></span><span
class=GramE>(</span>NA) can be expanded in an expression which contains only
one function <span class=SpellE>Cos</span>(A) and all the coefficients are also
integers. In this problem your job is to find such a formula for <span
class=SpellE><span class=GramE>Cos</span></span><span class=GramE>(</span>NA)
given the value of N.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
50 lines of inputs. Each line contains a positive integer N (N&lt;50). Input is
terminated by a line containing a single zero.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input except the last one you
should produce one line of output. This line should contain the formula (As
described in the problem <span class=SpellE>statment</span>) for <span
class=SpellE><span class=GramE>Cos</span></span><span class=GramE>(</span>NA).
You dont need to print any redundant things in the output such as (a) Printing
operators in two consecutive places (b) Printing the exponent when it is 1 (c)
Printing the coefficient when it is 1 (d) Just look at the output for sample
input for details.</h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2Cos^2(A)-1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4Cos^3(A)-3Cos(A)<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8Cos^4(A)-8Cos^2(A)+1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

color:windowtext'>Problem setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

	{mso-list-id:816530494;

	mso-list-template-ids:2003857212 -1310846134 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>SMS</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='text-align:right'>&quot;Percent sign sand
dollar sign! And colon semicolon, too!&quot;<br>
&quot;<span class=GramE>You Asterisk-mouth!&quot;</span> </p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:right;
text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'><span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]><em>Sam &amp; Max: Hit the Road</em> </p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:right'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:0;width:150.25pt;height:203.5pt;
 z-index:1'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image001.jpg"  o:href="../../pa-sms/sms.jpg"/>
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=200 height=271
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image001.jpg"  align=left hspace=12 class=floating v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><span
class=GramE>When typing SMS messages on a mobile phone, each of the ten digit
buttons represent several alphabetic characters.</span> On my phone (an ancient
Ericsson T65, in case anyone was wondering), I have the following mapping (1 is
used for <span class=GramE>space,</span> and 0 for some common non-alphabetic
symbols): </p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>2 &#8594; ABC,</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>3 &#8594; DEF,</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>4 &#8594; GHI,</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>5 &#8594; JKL,</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>6 &#8594; MNO,</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>7 &#8594; PQRS,</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>8 &#8594; TUV,</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>9 &#8594; WXYZ</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style='text-align:justify'>As you've probably experienced, this makes the typing
quite cumbersome. The phones usually try to compensate this by making use of a
dictionary  basically, the idea is that there will typically be relatively few
actual words having the same button combination. <span class=GramE>The way this
works is that when you have typed a certain digit sequence, you can cycle
through the words in the dictionary that map to this digit sequence using the
&quot;up&quot; and &quot;down&quot; buttons.</span> Pressing &quot;up&quot;
gives you the next word, and pressing &quot;down&quot; gives you the previous
word. Words are ordered by how common they <span class=GramE>are,</span> most
common words first and least common words last. This wraps, so that pressing
&quot;up&quot; at the last word gives you the first word and similarly for
&quot;down&quot;. Initially after having pressed a digit sequence, you will get
the first (most common) word <span class=GramE>that maps</span> to this
sequence. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>This usually works quite well, but if you're
trying to type a word that does not exist in the dictionary, you have to write
it by separating it into several parts, where each part is a word in the
dictionary. In order to start writing a new part, you have to press the
&quot;right&quot; button on the keypad. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Obviously, the number of keys needed to type a
word depends on how (and if) we divide it into parts. Now, I would like to know
how to type a word (that may or may not be from the dictionary) using as few
key presses as possible (it's not that I'm lazy, I just want to decrease the
wear and tear of my keypad). </p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of several data sets (at most
5), terminated by a line containing a single 0. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Each data set begins with an integer 1 &#8804; <em>N</em>
&#8804; 10000 giving the size of the dictionary, followed by <em>N</em> lines,
giving the words of the dictionary from most common to least common. Words
consist solely of lower case 'a'-'z' and are at most 10 characters long. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>Then follows an integer <em>Q</em>
&#8805; 1 giving the number of words to type.</span> This is followed by <em>Q</em>
lines, each containing a nonempty word to type. It will always be possible to
type the given words using the given dictionary. The total length of all <em>Q</em>
words to type will be at most 250000. </p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p>For each query, output a line containing any optimal <span class=SpellE>keypress</span>
solution in the following format. </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5;tab-stops:list .5in'>For pressing any of the
     digits 2-9, simply output that digit. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5;tab-stops:list .5in'>For pressing right, output '<tt><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt'>R</span></tt>'. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l2 level1 lfo5;tab-stops:list .5in'>For pressing up or down <em>x</em>
     &gt; 0 times, output &quot;<tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>U(</span></tt><em>x</em><tt><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt'>)</span></tt>&quot; or &quot;<tt><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt'>D(</span></tt><em>x</em><tt><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt'>)</span></tt>&quot;, respectively.</li>
</ul>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input</span><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>echo<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  class=SpellE><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>echoecho</span></span><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>m<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>n<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Relational Operators</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>Some <span class=GramE>operators</span> checks about the
relationship between two values and these operators are called relational
operators. Given two numerical values your job is just to find out the
relationship between them that is (<span class=SpellE>i</span>) First one is
greater than the second (ii) First one is less than the second or (iii) First
and second one is equal.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>&nbsp;</p>

<h5><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file is
an integer t (t&lt;15) which denotes how many sets of inputs are there. Each of
the next t lines contain two integers a and b (|<span class=SpellE>a|<span
class=GramE>,|</span>b</span>|&lt;1000000001).<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. This line contains any one of the relational operators
&gt;, &lt; or =, which indicates the relation that is appropriate for the
given two numbers.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                     </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=287 valign=top style='width:215.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 20<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>20 10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 <span class=SpellE>10</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=329 valign=top style='width:246.75pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&lt;<o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&gt;<o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>=<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

	margin-left:0in;
	text-align:justify;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.text, li.text, div.text
	{mso-style-name:text;
	mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:8.0pt;
	font-family:Verdana;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}

	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}

	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;

	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="11266"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Grey Codes </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Gray hair is God's graffiti.</span></i><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'> </span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align=right style='text-align:right'><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Bill
Cosby</span></tt><span style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph>We are going to generate a sequence of integers in binary.
Start with the sequence </p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0<br>
  1<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:.75pt'>
  <td style='background:black;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;height:.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:1.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
Reflect it in the horizontal line, <span class=SpellE>prepend</span> a zero to
the numbers in the top half and a one to the numbers on the bottom and you will
get </p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>00<br>
  01<br>
  11<br>
  10<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
Repeat this again, and you will have 8 numbers </p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>000<br>
  001<br>
  011<br>
  010<br>
  110<br>
  111<br>
  101<br>
  100<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=10 style='width:.1in;background:white;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0<br>
  1<br>
  3<br>
  2<br>
  6<br>
  7<br>
  5<br>
  4<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
The corresponding decimal values are shown on the right. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>These sequences are called Reflected
Gray Codes for 1, 2 and 3 bits respectively. A Gray Code for <b>n</b> bits is a
sequence of <nobr>2<b><sup>n</sup></b></nobr> different <nobr><b>n</b>-bit</nobr>
integers with the property that every two <span class=SpellE>neighbouring</span>
integers differ in exactly one bit. A Reflected Gray Code is a Gray Code
constructed in the way shown above.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=paragraph>The first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N</b>
(at most 250000). <b>N</b> test cases follow. Each one is a line with 2
integers: <b>n</b> <nobr>(1 &lt;= <b>n</b> &lt;= 30)</nobr> and <b>k</b> <nobr>(0
&lt;= <b>k</b> &lt; 2<b><sup>n</sup></b>)</nobr>. </p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output the
integer that appears in position <b>k</b> of the <nobr><b>n</b>-bit</nobr>
Reflected Gray Code.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>14<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 <span class=SpellE>3</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 5<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 6<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 7<o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>6<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>7<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'>Problem
setter: Igor <span class=SpellE>Naverniouk</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<style>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem J</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Stand in a Line </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>All the people in the <span
class=SpellE>byteland</span> want to stand in a line in such a way that no
person stands closer to the front of the line than his father. You are given
the information about the people of the <span class=SpellE>byteland</span>.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>You have to determine the number of ways the <span
class=SpellE>bytelandian</span> people can stand in a line. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input contains
T (T&lt;14) the number of test case. Then following lines contains T Test
cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each test case starts with 2
integers n (1&#8804;n&#8804;40000) and m (0&#8804;m&lt;n).<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=GramE>n</span> is the number of
people in the <span class=SpellE>byteland</span> and m is the number of people
whose father is alive. These n people are numbered 1...n.Next m line contains two integers <span class=GramE>a
and</span> b denoting that b is the father of a. Each person can have at most
one father. And no person will be an ancestor of himself.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case the output
contains a single line denoting the number of different ways the soldier can
stand in a single line. The result may be too big. So always output the remainder 
on dividing ther the result by 1000000007.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=paragraph style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'>Problem
setter: Abdullah-al-<span class=SpellE>Mahmud</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.8in .8in 67.7pt .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="10242"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span class=GramE><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>From</span></b></span><b><span
style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'> D to E and back</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
24.0pt;font-family:Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;<span
style='font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Anyone who goes to a
  psychiatrist ought to have his head examined.</span></i><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'> </span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align=right style='text-align:right'><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Samuel
Goldwyn</span></tt><span style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph>Take any directed graph <b>D</b> with <b>n</b> vertices and <b>m</b>
edges. You can make the Lying graph <b>E</b> of <b>D</b> in the following way. <b>E</b>
will have <b>m</b> vertices, one for each edge of <b>D</b>. For example, if <b>D</b>
has an edge <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><b>uv</b></span></span>, then <b>E</b>
will have a vertex called <span class=SpellE><b>uv</b></span>. Now, whenever <b>D</b>
has edges <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><b>uv</b></span></span> and <span
class=SpellE><b>vw</b></span>, <b>E</b> will have an edge from vertex <span
class=SpellE><b>uv</b></span> to vertex <span class=SpellE><b>vw</b></span>.
There are no other edges in <b>E</b>. </p>

<p class=paragraph>You will be given a graph <b>E</b> and will have to
determine whether it is possible for <b>E</b> to be the Lying graph of some
directed graph D.</p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=paragraph>The first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N </b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>(N&lt;220)</span>. <b>N</b> test cases
follow. Each one starts with two lines containing <b>m</b> <nobr>(0&#8804;<b>m</b>&#8804;300)</nobr>
and <b>k</b>. The next <b>k</b> lines will each contain a pair of vertices, <b>x</b>
and <b>y</b>, meaning that there is an edge from <b>x</b> to <b>y</b> in <b>E</b>.
The vertices are numbered from 0 to <nobr><b>m</b>-1</nobr> </p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=paragraph>For each test case, output one line containing &quot;Case #<b>x</b>:&quot;
followed by either &quot;Yes&quot; or &quot;No&quot;, depending on whether <b>E</b>
is a valid Lying graph or not. Note that <b>D</b> is allowed to have duplicate
edges and self-edges<span style='font-family:Arial'>. </span></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>9<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #1: Yes<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #2: Yes<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #3: No<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #4: Yes<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=paragraph style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>
