  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Winning Streak</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='text-align:right'>&quot;You can run on
for a long time<span class=GramE>,</span><br>
sooner or later <span class=SpellE>God'll</span> cut you down.&quot;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='text-align:right'> <em>Traditional folk
song</em> </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE>Mikael</span> likes to gamble,
and as you know, you can place bets on almost anything these days. A particular
thing that has recently caught <span class=SpellE>Mikael's</span> interest is
the length of the longest winning streak of a team during a season (i.e. the
highest number of consecutive games won). In order to be able to make smarter
bets, <span class=SpellE>Mikael</span> has asked you to write a program to help
him compute the expected value of the longest winning streak of his <span
class=SpellE>favourite</span> teams. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>In general, the probability that a team wins a
game depends on a lot of different factors, such as whether they're the home
team, whether some key player is injured, and so on. For the first prototype of
the program, however, we simplify this, and assume that all games have the same
fixed probability <em>p</em> of being won, and that the result of a game does
not affect the win probability for subsequent games. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The expected value of the longest streak is the
average of the longest streak in all possible outcomes of all games in a
season, weighted by their probability. For instance, assume that the season
consists of only three games, and that <em>p</em> = 0.4. There are eight
different outcomes, which we can represent by a string of '<span class=SpellE><tt><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>W</span></tt>'<span class=GramE>:s</span></span> and '<span
class=SpellE><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>L</span></tt>':s</span>,
indicating which games were won and which games were lost (for example, '<tt><span
style='font-size:10.0pt'>WLW</span></tt>' indicates that the team won the first
and the third game, but lost the second). The possible results of the season
are: </p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b>Result<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>LLL</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>LLW</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>LWL</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>LWW</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>WLL</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>WLW</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>WWL</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>WWW</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b>Probability<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.216</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.144</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.144</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.096</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.144</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.096</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.096</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0.064</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b>Streak<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>0</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>1</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>1</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>2</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>1</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>1</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>2</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>3</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p style='text-align:justify'>In this case, the expected length of the longest
winning streak becomes 0.216·0 + 0.144·1 + 0.144·1 + 0.096·2 + 0.144·1 +
0.096·1 + 0.096·2 + 0.064·3 = 1.104 </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Several test cases (at most 40),
each containing an integer 1 &#8804; <em>n</em> &#8804; 500 giving the number
of games in a season, and a floating point number 0 &#8804; <em>p</em> &#8804;
1, the win probability. Input is terminated by a case where <em>n</em> = 0,
which should not be processed. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, give the expected length of the longest
winning streak. The answer should be given as a floating point number with an
absolute error of at most 10<sup>-4</sup>. </p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 0.4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 0.75<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 0.5<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1.104000<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>5.068090<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Problem setter: <span
class=GramE>Per</span> <span class=SpellE>Austrin</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special
Thanks: <span class=SpellE>Mikael</span> <span class=SpellE>Goldmann</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]-->
<meta content="  name=Author>
<meta content="  name=Keywords>
<meta content="  name=Description>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="13314"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Fighting against a Polygonal Monster</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>You're fighting against a monster. You have
a special weapon that can shoot a laser beam. The laser beam can be seen as a
cylinder along the z-axis, So when look from above the XY plane, the laser beam
is actually a circle centered at (0,0) (yes, you cannot change the position of
center). The monster is a convex polygon (well, you may think of it as a very
thin prism) with n vertices surrounding the origin (i.e. (0<span class=GramE>,0</span>)
is strictly inside the monster, not on his boundary). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>You know that, when the common area of the
laser beam and the monster is at least R, the monster dies. Since larger laser
beam consumes more power, you're interested in the minimum radius of the laser
beam.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Write a program to find the minimum radius.
It is guaranteed that (0 </span><span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;
mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Symbol'>£</span></span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'> <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>R</i> </span><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span
style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>A</i>), where <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>A</i> is the area of the monster.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><i><span style='color:black;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input consists at most 10<span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> cases. Each
case starts with a single integer <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n </i>(3
</span><span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n </i></span><span style='font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> 50) and a floating-point number R followed
by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n</i> lines of two real numbers: the
coordinates of the monster. The points are arranged in counter-clockwise order
or clockwise order. The last test case is followed by a single zero, which
should not be processed. The meaning of N and R are given in the problem
statement.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>For each test case, print the case number
and the minimum radius, to 2 decimal places. Inputs will be such that small
precision errors will not change the visible output if you use double-precision
floating-point numbers.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>3 1.60<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>-1 -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>1 -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Case 1: 0.93<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:.5in'><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problem

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

Li<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Originally

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Morleys Theorem</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;Morleys theorem states that that the lines
trisecting the angles of an arbitrary plane triangle meet at the vertices of an
equilateral triangle. For example in the figure below the tri-sectors of angles
A, B and C has intersected and created an equilateral triangle DEF. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:262.5pt;
 height:166.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=350 height=222
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Of course <span lang=EN
style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>the theorem has various generalizations, in
particular if all of the tri-sectors are intersected one obtains four other
equilateral triangles. But in the original theorem only tri-sectors nearest to
BC are allowed to intersect to get point D, tri-sectors nearest to CA are
allowed to intersect point E and tri-sectors nearest to AB are intersected to
get point F. <span class=SpellE>Trisector</span> like BD and CE are not allowed
to intersect. So ultimately we get only one equilateral triangle DEF. Now your
task is to find the Cartesian coordinates of D, E and F given the coordinates
of A, B, and C.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file
contains an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;5001) which denotes the number of test cases
to follow. Each of the next lines contain six <span class=GramE>integers </span><span
style='position:relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:98.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=131 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233363688">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. <span class=GramE>This</span> six integers actually indicates
that the Cartesian coordinates of point A, B and C are <span style='position:
relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:2in;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=192 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233363689">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>respectively. You can
assume that the area of triangle ABC is not equal to zero, <span
style='position:relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:152.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=203 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233363690">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and the points A, B
and C are in counter clockwise order.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each line of input you should
produce one line of output. This line contains six floating point numbers <span
style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:99.75pt;height:17.25pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=133 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233363691">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>separated by a single
space. These six floating-point actually means that the Cartesian coordinates
of D, E and F are <span style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1031" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:129pt;height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=172 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233363692">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>respectively. Errors
less than<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span style='position:relative;
top:3.0pt;mso-text-raise:-3.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1032"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:21.75pt;height:15.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=29 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/p11178.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233363693">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>will be accepted.<o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span>Output for Sample Input</span><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

	{color:purple;

	{mso-bidi-font-style:normal;}
p.MsoPlainText, li.MsoPlainText, div.MsoPlainText
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:SV;
	mso-fareast-language:SV;}
p
	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
address
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-style:italic;}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.Preformatted, li.Preformatted, div.Preformatted
	{mso-style-name:Preformatted;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:none;
	tab-stops:0in 47.95pt 95.9pt 143.85pt 191.8pt 239.75pt 287.7pt 335.65pt 383.6pt 431.55pt 479.5pt;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.paragraph, li.paragraph, div.paragraph
	{mso-style-name:paragraph;
	mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.8in .8in 67.7pt .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1

 /* List Definitions */

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="8194"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Bit Stream</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Imagine some kind of measuring apparatus that
produces a long stream of bits as the result of one measurement. This could be,
for instance, the observation of a distant flickering star at regular intervals
of a millisecond, where a 1-bit signals visibility and a 0-bit signals non-<span
class=SpellE>visiblity</span>. These <span class=SpellE>bitstreams</span> can
get very long, several millions per hour in the case of our flickering star
example, and will require lots of storage space. If the value of the bit
doesn't change very often, that is, there are long runs of consecutive 1-bits
followed by long runs of consecutive 0-<span class=GramE>bits,</span> a substantial
reduction in storage space can be achieved if only the run-lengths of the runs
are stored. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>In this problem we will denote the compressed <span
class=SpellE>bitstream</span> as a sequence of numbers: the first number is the
number of 0-bits at the start of the stream, the second is the number of 1-bits
following, then the number of 0-bits following, etc. The end of the <span
class=SpellE>bitstream</span> is signaled by the number 0 (zero). A zero at the
start of the sequence means that the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span> starts
with a 1-bit. Examples: </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>&quot;000000111001111111100000111&quot;
     is compressed as: 6 3 2 8 5 3 0. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>&quot;111001111100000101111111111&quot;
     is compressed as: 0 3 2 5 <span class=SpellE>5</span> 1 <span
     class=SpellE>1</span> 10 0. </li>
</ul>

<p style='text-align:justify'>To ensure that the compressed <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>
contains no errors, we take two measures: we remember the length, <b>L</b> of
the original <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>, and we calculate a particular
checksum of the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>. The checksum is determined
by the bits in the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span> and three numbers <b>b</b>,
<b>n</b> and <b>m</b>. It is calculated as follows: </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo6;tab-stops:list .5in'>The <span
     class=SpellE>bitstream</span> is divided into 'chunks' of <b>b</b> bits
     each. If the length of the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span> is not
     divisible by <b>b</b>, we pad the last chunk with 0-bits. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo6;tab-stops:list .5in'>Let every
     chunk represent a binary number, with the leftmost bit being the most
     significant. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo6;tab-stops:list .5in'><span
     class=SpellE>Initialise</span> the variable <b>C</b> with zero, then for
     every chunk, from the beginning of the stream to the end: </li>
 <ul type=circle>
  <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
      auto;text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level2 lfo6;tab-stops:list 1.0in'>multiply
      <b>C</b> with the number <b>n</b>; </li>
  <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
      auto;text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level2 lfo6;tab-stops:list 1.0in'>add
      the number that is represented by the chunk; </li>
  <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
      auto;text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level2 lfo6;tab-stops:list 1.0in'><span
      class=GramE>take</span> the remainder of division by <b>m</b> and assign
      it to <b>C</b>. </li>
 </ul>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo6;tab-stops:list .5in'>The final
     value of <b>C</b> is the checksum of the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>
     for a given <span class=SpellE>tripplet</span> <b>b</b>, <b>n</b> and <b>m</b>.
     </li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In the first example above, the
length <b>L</b>=27. Using <b>b</b>=5, <b>n</b>=17 and <b>m</b>=53, we calculate
the checksum as follows:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
Chunks are
&quot;00000&quot;,&quot;01110&quot;,&quot;01111&quot;,&quot;11110&quot;,&quot;00001&quot;
and &quot;11000&quot;, which represent the numbers 0<span class=GramE>,14,15,30,1</span>
and 24. (Note the three padding 0-bits in the last chunk). The checksum is
calculated<span class=GramE>:</span><br>
( 0*17 + 0) mod 53 = 0; ( 0*17 + 14) mod 53 = 14; (14*17 + 15) mod 53 = 41;
(41*17 + 30) mod 53 = 38; (38*17 + 1) mod 53 = 11; (11*17 + 24) mod 53 = 52.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
So the checksum is 52. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Several (less than 1200) compressed
<span class=SpellE>bitstreams</span> in the following format: the number <b>L</b>,
the length of the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>; the triplet <b>b</b>, <b>n</b>
and <b>m</b>, as defined above, needed to calculate the checksum; <b>C</b>, the
checksum of the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>; the numbers representing
the compressed <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>. Remember that the last
number is always zero.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
The input of each <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span> starts on a new line and
is given in one or more lines, the numbers on a line are separated by spaces.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><br>
The input is terminated by a 0 (zero) on a line by itself. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><u>Ranges<span class=GramE>:</span></u><br>
(1 &#8804; <b>L</b> &#8804; 10<sup>10</sup>), (5 &#8804; <b>b</b> &#8804; 32),
(1 &#8804; <b>n</b> &#8804; 4294967295), (1 &#8804; <b>m</b> &#8804;
4294967295), (0 &#8804; <b>C</b> &lt; <b>m</b>).<br>
The compressed <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span> consists of up to 100000
numbers with values up to 100000. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span>
in the input, one line stating the <span class=SpellE>bitstream</span> number,
starting from 1, and stating the status of the compressed data: </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'>&quot;<span
     class=SpellE>Bitstream</span> x: Invalid Length&quot;, if the length of
     the compressed data is not equal to the value of <b>L</b>; </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'>&quot;<span
     class=SpellE>Bitstream</span> x: Invalid Checksum&quot;, if the length is
     correct, but the checksum of the compressed data is not equal to <b>C</b>;
     </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo9;tab-stops:list .5in'>&quot;<span
     class=SpellE>Bitstream</span> x: Compression OK&quot;, if both length and
     checksum are correct. </li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Replace x with the appropriate
number and omit the surrounding quotes. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="97%"
 style='width:97.14%;margin-left:5.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;
 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.06%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>27 5 17 53 52 6 3 2 8 5 3 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>28 7 65 1111 351<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 3 2 5 <span
  class=SpellE>5</span> 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 10 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>27<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>7 65 1111<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>153<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 3 2 5 <span
  class=SpellE>5</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 10 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>26 5 17 53 25 6 3 2 8 5 3 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.94%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span class=SpellE><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Bitstream</span></b></span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'> 1: Compression OK<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>Bitstream</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'> 2: Invalid Length<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>Bitstream</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'> 3: Invalid Checksum<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>Bitstream</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'> 4: Invalid Length<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='margin-left:.5in'>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;

<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="6146"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Base i-1</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>A complex system that
  works is invariably found<br>
  to have evolved from a simple system that works. </span></i><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align=right style='text-align:right'><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>John
<span class=SpellE>Gaule</span></span></tt><span style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>Everyone knows about base-2
(binary) integers and base-10 (decimal) integers, but what about base <b><i>i</i>-1</b>?
A complex integer n has the form <nobr>n=<span class=SpellE>a+b<i>i</i></span></nobr>,
where and <span class=SpellE>and</span> b are integers, and <span class=SpellE><i>i</i></span>
is the square root of -1 (which means that <nobr><i>i</i><sup>2</sup>=-1</nobr>).
A complex integer n written in base <nobr>(<i>i</i>-1)</nobr> is a sequence of
digits <nobr>(b<sub>i</sub>)</nobr>, <span class=SpellE>writen</span>
right-to-left, each of which is either 0 or 1 (no negative or imaginary
digits!), and the following equality must hold. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><tt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>n = b<sub>0</sub>
+ <span class=GramE>b<sub>1</sub>(</span><i>i</i>-1) + b<sub>2</sub>(<i>i</i>-1)<sup>2</sup>
+ b<sub>3</sub>(<i>i</i>-1)<sup>3</sup> + ... </span></tt><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>The cool thing is that every
complex integer has a unique base-(<i>i</i>-1) representation, with no minus sign
required. Your task is to find this representation. </p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input gives the
number of cases, <b>N</b> (at most 20000). <b>N</b> test cases follow. Each one
is a line containing a complex integer <span class=SpellE>a+b<i>i</i></span> as
a pair of integers, <span class=GramE>a and</span> b. Both <span class=GramE>a
and</span> b will be in the range from <nobr>-1,000,000</nobr> to <nobr>1,000,000</nobr>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each test
case, output one line containing &quot;Case #<b>x</b>:&quot; followed by the
same complex integer, written in base <i>i</i>-1 with no leading zeros.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>11 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #1: 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #2: 1011<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #3: 111001101<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #4: 0<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:windowtext'>Problem setter: Igor <span class=SpellE>Naverniouk</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Probability|Given</span></b></span><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:right'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>N friends go to the local super
market together. The probability of their buying something from the market is <span
style='position:relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:80.25pt;
 height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image005.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=107 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image005.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233574645">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->respectively. After their marketing is finished you are given
the information that exactly r of them has bought something and others have
bought nothing. Given this information you will have to find their individual
buying probability.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
50 sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of each set contains
two integers N (1 &#8804; N &#8804; 20) and <span class=GramE>r(</span>0 &#8804;
r &#8804; N). Meaning of N and r are given in the problem statement. Each of
the next N lines contains one floating-point number <span style='position:relative;
top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image005.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image005.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233574646">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(0.1&lt;<span
style='position:relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image005.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/g_files/image005.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233574647">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->&lt;1) which actually denotes the buying probability of <span
class=GramE>the <span class=SpellE>i</span></span><span class=SpellE>-th</span>
friend. All probability values should have at most two digits after the decimal
point.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a case
where the value of N and r is zero. This case should not be processes.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each line of input produce
N+1 lines of output. First line contains the serial of output. Each of the next
N lines contains a floating-point number which denotes the buying probability
of <span class=GramE>the <span class=SpellE>i</span></span><span class=SpellE>-th</span>
friend given that exactly r has bought something. These values should have six
digits after the decimal point. Follow the exact format shown in output for
sample input. Small precision errors will be allowed. <span class=GramE>For
reasonable precision level use double precision floating-point numbers.</span></span><span
style='font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h1>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input</span><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=614
 style='width:6.4in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.20<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.30<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Case
  1:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.413043<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.739130<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.847826<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Case
  2:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.200000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.200000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.200000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.200000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0.200000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Zeroes III</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The factorial n! <span
class=GramE>of</span> a number n is defined as n!=1*2*3*
*n.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The function <span
style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:110.25pt;
 height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=147 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233596727">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>And the <span class=GramE>function
</span><span style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:183pt;height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=244 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233596728">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given two numbers n and b your
job is to find the number of trailing zeroes in <span style='position:relative;
top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30pt;height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233596729">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>when expressed in base
b.</p>

<h5><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains around
2000 lines of inputs. Each line contains two integers n (1<a name="OLE_LINK2"></a><a
name="OLE_LINK1"><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'>&#8804;</span></a> n &#8804;
1000000) and b (2&#8804; b &#8804; 10000). Input is terminated by a line
containing two zeroes.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce one line of
output which contains an integer Z, which denotes the number of trailing zeroes
in <span style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30pt;height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=40 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/h_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233596730">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, when expressed in base b.</h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                      </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=590
 style='width:6.15in;margin-left:-4.9pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:
 collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'><pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>10 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre
  style='tab-stops:.5in'><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>4 2<span
  style='mso-tab-count:1'>   </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>57<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem-setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>
