<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Teen Girl Squad </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>-- 3 spring rolls please.<br>
  -- MSG'D!!<br>
  -- Oh! My stomach lining! </span></i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align=right style='text-align:right'><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Strong
Bad</span></tt><span style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph>You are part of a group of <b>n</b> teenage girls armed with
<span class=SpellE>cellphones</span>. You have some news you want to tell
everyone in the group. The problem is that no two of you are in the same room, and
you must communicate using only <span class=SpellE>cellphones</span>. What's
worse is that due to excessive usage, your parents have refused to pay your <span
class=SpellE>cellphone</span> bills, so you must distribute the news by calling
each other in the cheapest possible way. You will call several of your <span
class=GramE>friends,</span> they will call some of their friends, and so on
until everyone in the group hears the news. </p>

<p class=paragraph>Each of you is using a different phone service provider, and
you know the price of girl <span class=GramE>A</span> calling girl B for all
possible A and B. Not all of your friends like each other, and some of them
will never call people they don't like. Your job is to find the cheapest
possible sequence of calls so that the news spreads from you to all <b>n</b>-1
other members of the group. </p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>(N&lt;150)</span>. <b>N</b> test cases follow. Each one starts with two
lines containing <b>n</b> <nobr>(0&lt;=<b>n</b>&lt;=1000)</nobr> and <b>m</b> <nobr>(0
&lt;= <b>m</b> &lt;= 40,000)</nobr>. Girls are numbered from 0 to <nobr><b>n</b>-1</nobr>,
and you are girl 0. The next <b>m</b> lines will each contain 3 integers, <b>u</b>,
<b>v</b> and <b>w</b>, meaning that a call from girl <b>u</b> to girl <b>v</b>
costs <b>w</b> cents <nobr>(0 &lt;= <b>w</b> &lt;= 1000)</nobr>. No other calls
are possible because of grudges, rivalries and because they are, like, lame.
The input file size is around 1200 KB.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output one
line containing &quot;Case #<b>x</b>:&quot; followed by the cost of the cheapest
method of distributing the news. If there is no solution, print
&quot;Possums!&quot; instead.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre>4</pre><pre>2</pre><pre>1</pre><pre>0 1 10</pre><pre>2</pre><pre>1</pre><pre>1 0 10</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>0 1 10</pre><pre>0 2 10</pre><pre>1 3 20</pre><pre>2 3 30</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>0 1 10</pre><pre>1 2 20</pre><pre>2 0 30</pre><pre>2 3 100<b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre>Case #1: 10</pre><pre>Case #2: Possums!</pre><pre>Case #3: 40</pre><pre>Case #4: 130</pre><pre><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'>Problem
setter: Igor <span class=SpellE>Naverniouk</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="8194"/>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem J</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Joyful Ride </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Suppose you want to own a roller coaster.
Before you start, you might be interested in designing the course. The course
is circular when seen from above, with <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n</i>
towers of equal distances on it. The figure below shows a course with <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n</i>=7 (numbers inside circles are heights
of towers).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:107.25pt;
 height:106.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/j_files/image001.png"  o:title="ride"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=143 height=142
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/j_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>To make the towers look interesting, their heights
should be distinct positive integers not greater than <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>n</i>+1. To let customers enjoy a large variety of excitement, the
height differences between neighboring towers should be all different. Since
there are <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n</i> height differences, each
integer value between 1 and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n</i> must appear
exactly once. In the example above, the height differences are: 8-1=7, 8-2=6,
7-2=5, 7-3=4, 5-3=2, 5-4=1, <span class=GramE>4</span>-1=3. You can check that
every integer between 1 and 7 appears exactly once.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'>Write a program to design the ride.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of <span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>several test
cases. Each case contains a single integer <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n
</i>(2 </span><span style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n </i></span><span style='font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> 1000), the number of towers. The last test
case is followed by a single zero, which should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'>For each test case, print the case number and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>n</i> numbers if the design is possible, '</span><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'>-1</span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'>' otherwise.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:

 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>7<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>234<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Case 1: 1 4 5 3 7 2 8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Case 2: -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

<span class=SpellE>Rujia</span> Liu<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem K</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Ternary</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
24.0pt;font-family:Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Standard Output <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>You will be given a decimal number. You will have
to convert it to its ternary (Base 3) equivalent.</p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h4 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>The input file contains at most 100 lines of inputs. Each line contains a
non-negative decimal integer <span class=GramE>N(</span>N&lt;1000000001). Input
is terminated by a line containing a negative value. This line should not be
processed.<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=paragraph>For each line of input produce one line of output. This line
contains the ternary equivalent of decimal value N.</p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>               </span><span style='mso-tab-count:2'>              </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1000<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>-1<o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>101<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10201<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1101001<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'>Problem setter:

style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="8194"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem <span class=GramE>A</span></span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Circum Triangle </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You will be given N distinct
points on the boundary of a circle whose center is at the origin. As the points
are on the same circle no three of them are collinear, so any three of them
creates a valid triangle. Your job is to find the summation of areas of these <sup><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>n</span></sup>c<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>3</span></sub> triangles. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input file contains at most 16 sets
of inputs. The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set starts with two integers
N (0 &#8804; N &#8804; 500) and <span class=GramE>R(</span>0&lt;R &#8804; 100).
Here N is the number of points and R is the radius of the circle. You can
assume that the center of the circle is always at the origin. This line is
followed by N lines each of which contains a floating-point number theta
(0.0&lt;=theta&lt;360.00) which actually denotes the angle in degree the
designated point creates with respect to the origin with x-axis. So for example
if theta is 30.00 degree then the Cartesian coordinate of the intended point is
(<span style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:77.25pt;
 height:15.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/a_files/image005.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=103 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/a_files/image005.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233908861">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->and<span style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:74.25pt;height:15.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/a_files/image005.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=99 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/a_files/image005.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1233908862">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. Assume that pi=2cos<sup><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>-1</span></sup>(0).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a set
where the value of N and R is zero.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>This
set should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce one line of
output. This line contains an integer number which
is the total area (rounded to nearest integer) of all possible triangles formed
by the given N points. The judge data will be such that small precision errors
will not cause the output to be different. Consider at least double-precision
floating numbers to do your calculations.</h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5 10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>100.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>300.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>310.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>320.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>3 20<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>100.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>300.00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>286<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>320<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>

</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

	{mso-style-next:Normal;

	mso-outline-level:4;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:16.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
h5
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	mso-outline-level:5;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	font-weight:normal;}
p.MsoHeading7, li.MsoHeading7, div.MsoHeading7
	{mso-style-next:Normal;
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-outline-level:7;
	mso-layout-grid-align:none;
	text-autospace:none;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}

	{margin:0in;

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;

	mso-para-margin:0in;

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="10242"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Water Crisis</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Water crisis is a severe problem
in Dhaka, the capital of <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Bangladesh</st1:country-region></st1:place>.
Specially, in summer water crisis is intolerable. WASA (Water and Sewerage
Authority) supplies water by container trucks in several places in <st1:place
w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place> during the summer. But with the increasing demand,
WASA is facing difficulty to satisfying the requirements. To devise a solution,
WASA is looking for some talented computer scientists who can find the best
strategy for WASA. WASA engineers have formulated the water crisis problem in
the following way and posed it before the computer scientists.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Dhaka city is connected and can
be divided into <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N&#8804;20</b>) places where water should
be delivered. The road network in <st1:place w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place> is
quite good and it takes at most <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>100</b>
minutes from one place to another. Nodes can be numbered from 1 to N and WASA itself
is node 1. In each day, the total demand is at most <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>K</b> (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>K&#8804;200</b>) trucks,
but the respective demand (specified in number of trucks) in each place can
vary from one another. Like any other government organization, WASA is also
lacking resources and it has only 3 working trucks. To simplify the problem,
loading-unloading time is assumed to be zero. WASA wants most efficient
utilization of its resources and it needs the minimum time by which water is
delivered to all the places and all three trucks return to WASA office.
Moreover, it may be the case that WASA cannot deliver to all places in a day.
If that occurs, you should report Too few trucks.</p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will start with an integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T (T&#8804;15) </b>which<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> </b>is the number of test cases. Each
input will start with N, followed by (N-1) integers which are the demand of
each place in successive order  there is no demand for node 1.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The next few lines contain the road network
of <st1:place w:st="on">Dhaka</st1:place> city. Each road is bidirectional and
given in the &lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>u v t</b>&gt; format,
where u, v are end places and t is the required time (in minutes) to travel
through the road. Road network ends with three zeros. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output should
start with a line Test Case <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>#</b>: T,
where T is the test case number. The next line contains the minimum delivery
time as specified. If it is more than <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>20
hrs</b>, you should report Too few trucks.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>7
  10 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  4 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Test Case #: 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>66 <span class=SpellE>mins</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Problem setter: <st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:State w:st="on">Md.</st1:State></st1:place> <span class=SpellE>Kamruzzaman</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special
Thanks: Abdullah al <span class=SpellE>Mahmud</span> (<span class=SpellE>Satej</span>)<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<meta content="  name=Keywords>
<meta content="  name=Description>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="10242"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>A Strange Opera House</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Yesterday evening, I have dreamed of a strange
opera house which is in the form of a simple polygon. I was standing on the
stage at (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>x</i>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>y</i>) singing &quot;That's All I Ask of You&quot; with my girlfriend -
that's our favorite song.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>The walls can reflect our voice at most <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>k</i> times. The following 4 figures show
how our voice is reflected.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:205.5pt;
 height:139.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  o:title="init"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=274 height=186
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:207pt;height:140.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  o:title="k_0"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=276 height=187
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>(a) </span><span
class=GramE><span style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>the</span></span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> opera house</span><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                   </span></span><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>(b)</span><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'> our original voice<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:207pt;height:140.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  o:title="k_1"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=276 height=187
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:207pt;height:140.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  o:title="k_2"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=276 height=187
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/c_files/image003.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]><span
style='font-size:9.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>(c) </span><span
class=GramE><span style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>reflecting</span></span><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> the voice
once</span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                       </span></span><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                       </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span></span><span style='font-size:9.0pt;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span>(d) </span><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>reflecting the
voice twice</span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:9.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Audiences are sitting by the walls. I wonder
how many of them could hear our song, either directly or indirectly. Can you
tell me?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><i><span style='color:black;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input consists of <span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>at most 10
test cases. Each case contains four integers <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>n</i>,<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> k</i>,<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'> x </i>and<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'> <span class=GramE>y<span
style='font-style:normal'>(</span></span></i>3 </span><span style='font-family:
Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>n </i></span><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span
style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> 50, 0 </span><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span
style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>k </i></span><span style='font-family:Symbol;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-char-type:
symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:Symbol'>£</span></span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'> 5), the number of vertices of the opera
house, the maximal number of reflections of our voice, and the location of the
stage. The stage will never be on a wall. The following <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>n</i> lines each contain two <span class=GramE>integers</span> <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>x<sub>i</sub></i> and <span class=SpellE><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>y<sub>i</sub></i></span>, the coordinates of
the vertices. The vertices are arranged either clockwise or counterclockwise.
The last case is followed by a single zero, which should not be processed. All
the coordinates are integers with absolute values not greater than 1000.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:
SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>For each test case, print the case number
and the total length of wall where our voice could arrive, to two decimal
places.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>20 200<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>200 100<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>300 125<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  class=SpellE>100</span></span><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

  class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

  ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>0</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Case 1: </span><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>469.86</span><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Case 2: </span><span style='font-family:
  "Courier New"'>106.67<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";

  <o:Characters>2705</o:Characters>
  <o:Company>ACM/ICPC</o:Company>
  <o:Lines>22</o:Lines>
  <o:Paragraphs>6</o:Paragraphs>
  <o:CharactersWithSpaces>3173</o:CharactersWithSpaces>
  <o:Version>11.5606</o:Version>
 </o:DocumentProperties>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="14338"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Pendulum</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Alex is trying
to make a simple Pendulum. When a bob of mass m, is tied with a weight less
string and allowed to oscillate freely (without any obstacle) then we get a
simple pendulum. If the bob is like very thin steel plate and has the shape of
a quadrilateral, it can be considered that all its weight (mg) is acting
through the center of gravity <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(G)</b>
downwards as shown in Figure 1. Such a bob is tied with a string of length <span
class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>len</b></span> at point <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A</b> and other side of the string is tied
with a fixed point <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>F</b>. Note that
point <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A</b> is always a point on the
boundary of the bob. Now if the pendulum is at a steady position then <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>F</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A</b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>G</b> will be on the same vertical line.
So now the effective length of the string <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>(L)</b>
actually becomes <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>FG</b> instead of the
original length of the string <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>FA</b>.
Given the description of the bob, length of the string (<span class=SpellE>len</span>)
and the period of the pendulum you will have to find out whether it is possible
to make such a pendulum using the given string and bob. You can assume that
string length <span class=GramE>wont</span> be used up when it is tied with the
bob. In case you dont remember, the formula to find the period of a simple
pendulum is:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;mso-text-raise:-15.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:57pt;
 height:36.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=76 height=49
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251538">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Here L is the
effective length and g is the acceleration due to gravitation. You can assume
that g=981 cm/s<sup>2</sup>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:200.25pt;height:213pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=267 height=284
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=314 valign=top style='width:235.55pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:159.75pt;height:257.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=213 height=343
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Figure 1:
  All force acting through the center of gravity downwards.</p>
  </td>
  <td width=314 valign=top style='width:235.55pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Figure 2: At
  steady position FAG are collinear and perpendicular with the horizon.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains less than
1010 sets of input. The description of each line is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set starts with a line
containing two floating point numbers <span class=SpellE>len</span> (1&#8804;len&#8804;1000),
T (0&#8804;T&#8804;10). Here <span class=SpellE>len</span> means the length of
the string (in cm) and T is the period of the pendulum (in sec). The next line
contains eight integers<span style='position:relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:131.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=175 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251539">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(0&lt;=<span
style='position:relative;top:6.0pt;mso-text-raise:-6.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:196.5pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=262 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/d_files/image011.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251540">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->&lt;10000). These integers actually denote the four corners
of a convex quadrilateral in clockwise or counter clockwise order and this
quadrilateral is actually the shape of the bob. The bob may be rotated when
hanged with a rope. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input is terminated by a set where the value of <span
class=SpellE>len</span> is negative. This set should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the serial of output
followed by a No if it is not possible to make such a pendulum. If it is
possible to make such a pendulum then print Yes followed by an integer d. d
indicates the total number of feasible points on the boundary of the bob where
string can be tied to make the desired pendulum. Look at the output for sample
input for format details. To solve this problem consider that if the absolute
difference of two values is less than 0.01 then they are actually the same
value. And judge input will be such that distance between two feasible points
will not be less than 0.01. In other words the value of d will always be even.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input</span><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>22.000 1.000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> 1 0 1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> 0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>24.240 1.000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> 1 0 1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> 0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>-24.200 1.000<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> 1 0 1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> 0 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Pendulum
  1: No<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Pendulum
  2: Yes 8<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Series of Powers</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this problem the summation of
series of powers is defined as below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='position:relative;top:7.0pt;mso-text-raise:-7.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:231.75pt;
 height:20.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=309 height=27
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251709">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Given the value of l, h and k your job is to find the value <span
class=GramE>of </span><span style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:
-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:44.25pt;height:15.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=59 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251710">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:
16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains around
1500 lines of inputs. Each line contains three integers l, h (<a
name="OLE_LINK2"></a><a name="OLE_LINK1"><span style='mso-bookmark:OLE_LINK2'>0&#8804;</span></a>
l &#8804; h &#8804; 15000000 and |l-h|&#8804;1000) and k (<span
style='position:relative;top:2.0pt;mso-text-raise:-2.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:6.75pt;height:12.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=9 height=17
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251711">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->&#8804; k &#8804; 15000000). Input is terminated by a line
containing three minus 1.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce one line of
output. This line contains the serial of output (printed in field width of
four) followed by the approximate value <span class=GramE>of </span><span
style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:44.25pt;height:15.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=59 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/111/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1234251712">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. This approximate value should be of the form 0.ddddddedddddddddd.
The value of mantissa is always less than 1 and has six digits after the
decimal point. If value of the exponent is irrelevant (Does not <span
class=GramE>effect</span> the value of the number) set its value as 1.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Follow the exact formatting shown in the
sample output. Small precision errors (less than 10<sup><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>-4</span></sup>) are allowed for the value of Mantissa.</h4>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="97%"

 border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.06%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 10 <span class=SpellE>10</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>10 15 100<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>-1 -1 -1<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.94%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

  0001: 0.149143e0000000011<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
