<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Perfect Square</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>People in the <span class=SpellE>Byteland</span>
do not love large prime numbers. So they never use the integers having prime
factors greater than 30. They love perfect square number. An integer is a
perfect square if its square root is an integer. 0<span class=GramE>,1,4,9</span>

are perfect square numbers. But -4 or 3 is not perfect square. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now people at <span class=SpellE>Byteland</span>
have a sequence of n numbers. They select <sup>n</sup>C<sub>2</sub> pairs of
numbers from this sequence. A pair is a square pair if the product of its
numbers is a perfect square. They are interested to calculate the number of
square pairs X among these <sup>n</sup>C<sub>2</sub> pairs.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Again they select <sup>n</sup>C<sub>3 </sub>triples
of numbers from this sequence. A triple is a square triples if the product of
its numbers is a perfect square. They are interested to calculate the number of
square triples Y among these <sup>n</sup>C<sub>3 </sub>triples. Help them to
calculate X and Y.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input contains
T the number of test case. Then following lines contains T Test cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each case starts with a line
containing one integer n the length of the sequence. The next line contains n
integers separated by a single space.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case output contain 2 integers X and Y
separated by a single space.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Constraints:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>-0&lt;n&#8804;200000</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>-Each
number in the sequence will have absolute value &lt;10^18.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>-No number
in the sequence will have prime factor greater than 30. But the sequence may
contain the number zero as an exception.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  <span class=SpellE>2</span> <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  <span class=SpellE>2</span> 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  -2 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  2 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10
  14 35 29<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <pre><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:windowtext'>Problem setter: Abdullah-al-<span class=SpellE>Mahmud</span>
(Satej)<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'>Special Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Group Reverse</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Group reversing a string means reversing
a string by groups. For example consider a string:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>TOBENU<span style='color:gray'>MBERON</span>EWEMEE<span
style='color:gray'>TAGAIN</span>ANDAGA<span style='color:gray'>INUNDE</span>RBLUEI<span
style='color:gray'>CPCSKY</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>This string has length 48. We
have divided into 8 groups of equal length and so the length of each group is
6. Now we can reverse each of these eight groups to get a new string:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>UNEBOT<span style='color:gray'>NOREBM</span>EEMEWE<span
style='color:gray'>NIAGAT</span>AGADNA<span style='color:gray'>EDNUNI</span>IEULBR<span
style='color:gray'>YKSCPC</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the string and number of
groups in it, your program will have to group reverse it.</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most 101 lines of
inputs. Each line contains at integer G (G&lt;10) which denotes the number of
groups followed by a string whose length is a multiple of G. The length of the
string is not greater than 100. The string contains only alpha numerals. Input
is terminated by a line containing a single zero.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'>For
each line of input produce one line of output which contains the group reversed
string. </p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input</span><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 ABCEHSHSH<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5
  FA0ETASINAHGRI0NATWON0QA0NARI0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>CBASHEHSH<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'>ATE0AFGHANISTAN0IRAQ0NOW0IRAN0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem-setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: Derek Kisman<br style='mso-special-character:
line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span class=SpellE><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Infinix</span></b></span><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE>Infinix</span>
is a powerful processor that can evaluate any number of instructions (simple
addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) at the same time (of
course, the operands need to be available). To take the benefit of <span
class=SpellE>Infinix</span>, a separate compiler is also required, as
traditional compilers may produce codes that are not so suitable for <span
class=SpellE>Infinix</span>. For example, to evaluate an expression  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i>1+2+3+4 </i>traditional
compilers may produce code like  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>[I1] <span class=GramE>Add<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>R1</span>, 1, 2</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>[I2] <span class=GramE>Add<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>R2</span>, R1, 3</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>[I3] <span class=GramE>Add<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>R3</span>, R2, 4</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here <i>R3</i> holds the
summation. The problem with this code is that it introduces unnecessary data
dependences (I2 cannot be executed until I1 is finished), which are difficult
to overcome by hardware techniques. If addition operation takes 1 cycle in <span
class=SpellE>Infinix</span>, for this code it will take 3 cycles. An
intelligent compiler can produce another code for this expression  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>[I1] Add R1, 1, 2</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>[I2] Add R2, 3, 4</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>[I3] Add R3, R1, R2</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For the above code 2 cycles will
be enough to find the summation in <i>R3</i>. The difference is <span
class=GramE>I1,</span> I2 can be executed in parallel now. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Researchers are designing a new
compiler for <span class=SpellE>Infinix</span>, which they call <span
class=SpellE>Infinicx</span>. <span class=SpellE>Infinicx</span> always
produces code, which can be evaluated in minimum time by <span class=SpellE>Infinix</span>.
Though, <span class=SpellE>Infinicx</span> can produce code to its own, it
follows the programmer assigned order and program semantics. For example, if
the above expression is written by the programmer like 1<span class=GramE>+(</span>2+3)+4,
then <span class=SpellE>Infinicx</span> will produce the following code  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Add R1, 2, 3</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Add R2, 1, R1</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Add R3, 4, R2</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>And it will take 3 cycles again.
It cannot be converted to a code, which can be executed in 2 cycles. Also, <span
class=SpellE>Infinicx</span> never changes any operators or operands or order
of operands.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this problem, you will be
given the latency for add, sub, <span class=SpellE>mul</span> and div
operations for <span class=SpellE>Infinix</span>. You need to find the minimum
cycles necessary to evaluate the expression by <span class=SpellE>Infinix</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>&nbsp;</p>

<h5><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file will start with 4 integers
a, s, m, d which are the number of cycles necessary for executing an addition,
subtraction, multiplication and division operation in <span class=SpellE>Infinix</span>.
The next line contains the expression (syntactically correct), which only
contains digits, operators (+-*/) and parentheses. The expression length will
not be greater than 500. There can be many such datasets. Input will be
terminated by a line containing four zeroes.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each input, print in a single
line the minimum number of cycles necessary to evaluate the expression, as
described above.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                      </span>Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1+2+3+4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1+(2+3)+4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1-2-3-4*1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 3 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1-2-3-4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span
  class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=321 valign=top style='width:240.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problem-setter: <st1:State w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">Md.</st1:place></st1:State> <span class=SpellE>Kamruzzaman</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Special Thanks: Abdullah-al-<span class=SpellE>Mahmud</span>
(<span class=SpellE>Satej</span>)<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:Wingdings;
	panose-1:5 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0;
	mso-font-charset:2;
	mso-generic-font-family:auto;
	mso-font-pitch:variable;
	mso-font-signature:0 268435456 0 0 -2147483648 0;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Stone Grid </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph>In the country of <span class=SpellE>Byteland</span>, there
is a grid of R rows and C columns. In this grid, most of the cells contain some
number of marbles. At each step, the <span class=SpellE>Bytelandian</span>
people perform one of the following operations: </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>They can
     select any pair of adjacent cells and place one stone into each of the two
     cells.</li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo3;tab-stops:list .5in'>They can
     select any pair of adjacent cells and take one stone from each of the two
     cells. None of the two cells are allowed to be empty for this operation to
     take place.</li>
</ul>

<p class=paragraph>Some of the cells are evil and may not be used in either of
the above operations. The <span class=SpellE>Bytelandian</span> people are
given a grid with a number of stones in the cells. They want to rearrange the
stones using the two operations. They are not allowed to waste stones (which
will be used for another purpose later), so the do not want the final stone
arrangement to have more than L stones. For the same reason, they do not want
the final arrangement to have more stones than the initial grid configuration
does. </p>

<p class=paragraph>Now they wonder how many different final stone arrangements
in the grid they can reach. Two arrangements are different if there <span
class=GramE>exists</span> a cell, such that the two arrangements differ in the
number of stones in that cell. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=paragraph>The first line of input gives the number of cases, T (T &#8804;
40). T test cases follow. Each one starts with 3 integers - R, C (1 &#8804; R,
C &#8804; 20) and L (0 &#8804; L &#8804; 1000). Each of the next R lines
contains C integers. The <span class=SpellE>j<sup>th</sup></span> integer in
the <span class=SpellE>i<sup>th</sup></span> row denotes the number of initial
stones in the cell (<span class=SpellE>i</span>, j). If the integer is -1 then
the cell is evil. The number of initial stones in each cell does not exceed 10.
</p>

<p class=paragraph>There is a blank line between two consecutive test cases in
the input file. </p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=paragraph>For each test case, output a single integer, giving the
total number of final arrangements the <span class=SpellE>Bytelandians</span>
can reach. The result may be very big, so output only its remainder after
division by 10007. </p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
