<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem <span class=GramE>A</span></span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Attacker</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>There
are k attackers in an n * m chessboard. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>The
<span class=SpellE>i-th</span> attacker is located in (X<sub>i</sub>, Y<sub>i</sub>),
with <span class=GramE>a</span> attacking range of <span class=SpellE>R<sub>i</sub></span>.
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>A
square (X, Y) is attacked by the <span class=SpellE>i-th</span> attacker if and
only if |X <span class=GramE>-<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>X<sub>i</sub></span>|
+ |Y - Y<sub>i</sub>| &lt;= <span class=SpellE>R<sub>i</sub></span>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Count
the number of squares on the chessboard attacked by at least one attacker.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<pre style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'><br
style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre style='text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>There are several input cases. The first line contains three integers</span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'> </span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>n, m, k (1 &#8804; <span class=SpellE>n<span
class=GramE>,m</span></span> &#8804; 100000000, 1 &#8804; k &#8804; 20000)</span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>In the following k lines, each line contains three integers X<sub>i</sub>, Y<sub>i</sub>, <span
class=SpellE>R<sub>i</sub></span> (1 </span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&#8804;</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'> X<sub>i </sub></span><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&#8804;</span><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> n, 1</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&#8804; </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Y<sub>i </sub></span><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&#8804; </span><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>m, 1 </span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&#8804; </span><span class=SpellE><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>R<sub>i</sub></span></span><sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> </span></sub><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&#8804;</span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>1000000), the position and attack </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>range of each attacker.<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>The last case is followed by
a single zero, which should not be processed.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<pre><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>For each case, print the case number and the answer.<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
 outset black .75pt;mso-padding-alt:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td valign=top style='border:inset black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:inset black .75pt;
  padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;color:windowtext'>Sample
  Input</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border:inset black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:inset black .75pt;
  padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;color:windowtext'>Sample
  Output</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td valign=top style='border:inset black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:inset black .75pt;
  background:#D0D0D0;padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>4 <span
  class=SpellE>4</span> 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>3 1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>3 <span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>1 10 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='border:inset black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:inset black .75pt;
  background:#D0D0D0;padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

  10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<title>Problem B - Prime Frog</title>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Prime Frog</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The country prime land can be
considered as an infinite quarter plane. The cell in the row x and column y has
co-ordinates (x, y).The cell in its lower left corner has co-ordinates (1, 1).
A frog lives in this lower left cell. This frog knows some math and he is familiar
with n prime numbers. They are P<sub>0</sub>, P<sub>1</sub>&#8230; <span
class=GramE>P<sub>n-1</sub>.</span> <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;</span>These are called frog prime. Now from the
co-ordinate (x, y) the frog can jump to the following co-ordinates (x + y, y), (<span
class=GramE>x ,x</span> + y), (|x- y|, y), (x , |x-y|). Also for each frog
prime P<sub>i</sub> the frog can jump to (x*P<sub>i</sub>, y), (<span
class=GramE>x ,y</span>*P<sub>i</sub>). If x is divisible by P<sub>i</sub> then
it can jump to (x/P<sub>i</sub>, y). If y is divisible by P<sub>i</sub> then it
can jump to (x, y/P<sub>i</sub>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:.5in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A poor farmer in the prime land has
a rectangular land. The lower left co-ordinate of this land is (r<sub>1</sub>,
c<sub>1</sub>) when its upper right co-ordinate is (r<sub>2</sub><span
class=GramE>,c<sub>2</sub></span>). Each cell of his land can produce 1 unit of
corn in each season. But the prime frog is annoying the poor farmer much.
Whenever the frog visits a cell it spoils all the corn in that cell. So the
poor farmer decided not to cultivate those cells which are reachable by the
frog. Help the farmer to maximize the units of corn that he can produce in a
season.</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal>First line of the input contains <span class=GramE>T(</span>1&#8804;T&#8804;120)
the number of test cases. Then T test cases follow. Each test case consists of
2 lines. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal>First line &#8211; r<sub>1</sub> c<sub>1</sub> r<sub>2</sub>
c<sub>2</sub></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Second line &#8211; n P<sub>0</sub> P<sub>1</sub> &#8230;. P<sub>n-1</sub>
</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE>1&#8804;r<sub>1</sub>&#8804;r<sub>2</sub>&#8804;10^6,
1&#8804;c<sub>1</sub>&#8804;c<sub>2</sub>&#8804;10^6.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>1&#8804;n&#8804;15.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>2&#8804;P<sub>i</sub>&#8804;50 and P<sub>i</sub> is a prime
number.</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case output contains one line denoting the
maximum unit of corn that the farmer can produce in each season.</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input</span><span style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=299 valign=top style='width:224.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 <span class=SpellE>2</span> 5 <span
  class=SpellE>5</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 <span class=SpellE>2</span> 5 <span
  class=SpellE>5</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 <span class=SpellE>2</span> 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=317 valign=top style='width:237.95pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal>Problem-setter: Abdullah al <span class=SpellE>Mahmud</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Special Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span></p>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>GCD + LCM</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the value of N, you will
have to find the number of digits in G and L in base googol (<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:24.75pt;
 height:15.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=33 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254249271">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->). The definition of G and L are given below:</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i
  style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
   type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:107.25pt;height:36pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=143 height=48
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254249272">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><o:p></o:p></i></p>
  </td>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.55pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i
  style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"
   type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:107.25pt;height:36pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=143 height=48
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254249273">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><o:p></o:p></i></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If you are not accustomed with
the <span class=GramE>symbol </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254249274">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, then for your kind information we give an example: <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:428.25pt;height:36pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=571 height=48
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/c_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254249275">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here <span class=GramE>GCD(</span><span
class=SpellE>i,j</span>) means the greatest common divisor of integer <span
class=SpellE>i</span> and integer j, and LCM(<span class=SpellE>i,j</span>) means
the Least Common Multiplicand of integer <span class=SpellE>i</span> and
integer j.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most 100
lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer N (1&lt;N&lt;1000001). Input is
terminated by a line containing a single zero. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. This line contains the serial of output followed by two
integers DG and DL. Here DG is the number of digits in G when written in base
googol and DL is the number of digits in L when written in base googol. Dont
even think of submitting a brute force solution: It will probably take more
than 2 years for the largest possible input. Look at the output for sample
input for format details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span

  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;

<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="13314"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Marble Game </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You and your friend are playing a
game. The game field contains n boxes arranged in a circle. The boxes are
numbered from 0 to n-1. <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>ith</span></span>
box has 2 adjacent box. Box (i+1) mod n is its adjacent in clockwise direction
while box (i-1+n) mod n is its adjacent in anticlockwise direction. In each
move you and your friend select 2 marble. You move your selected marble in
clockwise direction while your friend move his selected marble in anticlockwise
direction simultaneously. The goal of the game is to move all the marbles in a
single cell. A cell is a valid destination if you can move all the marbles to
that cell by following the rules of the game. Also for each valid destination
you can move all the marbles to there in minimum number of moves. You have to
calculate the sum of all these minimum number of moves.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span>First line contains <span class=GramE>T(</span>1&#8804;T&#8804;120) the
number of test cases. Each test case contains 2 lines. First line contains <span
class=GramE>n(</span>1&#8804;n&#8804;50000) the number of boxes. Second line
contains n non-negative integers. The <span class=SpellE>ith</span> integer
denotes the number of marbles in box <span class=SpellE>i</span>. Each box can
have at most 10000 marble initially. For each test case the total number of
marble is positive.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><br>
For each test case output contains 2 integers separated by a single space. The
first integer is the number of valid destination cells and the second integer
is sum of minimum number of moves to all these valid destinations. The input
will be such that the second integer will fit 64 bit signed integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                       </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 <span class=SpellE>1</span>
  <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span>
  <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

  <pre><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

</table>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Stupid Sequence</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>A stupid sequence is a sequence
generated by a function defined by a polynomial as shown below:<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:4in;
 height:22.5pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=384 height=30
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254386020">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>So the stupid sequence is
actually <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>f(1), f(2), f(3), f(4)
</i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You can assume that for all i (<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:42pt;height:15.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=56 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254386021">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->), <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:62.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=83 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254386022">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In this problem you will be given the first 1500 terms of
stupid sequence, and you will have to find the values of <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:114pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=152 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254386023">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file
contains an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;101) which denotes the total number of input
set. <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>The description of each set is
given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set contains 1500 lines of
inputs. Each line contains a single integer. The i-th line of a set denotes the
i-th element of a stupid sequence. All these integers fit in 64-bit unsigned
integer. There is a blank line after the input of each set.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each set of input produce one
line of output. This line contains the values of <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:114pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=152 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/e_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1254386024">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. All these values are non-negative and less than 1001. If
such values are not found print a line This is a smart sequence! instead.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><a href="p11319.in">sample.in</a><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>//Too large to paste here so //download from the
  link above<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0 0 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0 1 1 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>This is a smart sequence!<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Problemsetter:
Shahriar Manzoor</p>

Thanks: Abdullah al Mahmud</p>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Hidden Triangles</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 align=right
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-lspace:9.0pt;margin-left:6.75pt;
 mso-table-rspace:9.0pt;margin-right:6.75pt;mso-table-anchor-vertical:paragraph;
 mso-table-anchor-horizontal:column;mso-table-left:right;mso-table-top:middle;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;mso-element:frame;
  mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:
  paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:column;mso-element-left:right;
  mso-element-top:middle;mso-height-rule:exactly'><img width=312 height=176
  id="_x0000_i1025" src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;
  mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:
  column;mso-element-left:right;mso-element-top:middle;mso-height-rule:exactly'>Figure
  1:</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'>When consecutive lattice points along x-axis are
connected with consecutive lattice points of another row above it, several
triangles are formed as shown in Figure 1. Lattice points, are the points in
two-dimensional coordinate system whose abscissa and ordinate has integer
values. For example (3, 4) is a lattice point but (3, 4.5) is not a lattice
point. Consecutive lattice points of a row means the lattice points whose
y-coordinate value is same but whose x-coordinate value is consecutive. Such a
group of lattice points can be specified by specifying only the x-coordinate of
the left most point and x-coordinate of the rightmost point. So to describe a
system of points in two rows, five integers are enough. Lets say these
integers are x<sub>1</sub>down, x<sub>2</sub>down, x<sub>1</sub>up, x<sub>2</sub>up
and h. Where x<sub>1</sub>down and x<sub>2</sub>down are the x-coordinates of
leftmost and rightmost points on x-axis respectively, h is the distance between
x-axis and the row above it. <span class=GramE>x<sub>1</sub>up</span> and x<sub>2</sub>up
are the x-coordinates of leftmost and right most points of the row above. All
points on x-axis are connected with all points on the row above it via <span
class=GramE>an</span> straight line segment. After connecting these points many
triangles is formed whose base is the x-axis and height is less than h. In the
figure-1 x<sub>1</sub>down=5, x<sub>2</sub>down=8, x<sub>1</sub>up=5 and x<sub>2</sub>up=7
and h=1 and there 18 such triangles are formed. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</h5>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If x1down=0, x2down=2, x1up=0 and
x2up=2 and h=1 then nine such triangles are formed<span class=GramE>..</span>
All these triangles are filled black in Figure 2. </p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=219 valign=top style='width:164.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=205 height=125 id="_x0000_i1026"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
  <td width=218 valign=top style='width:163.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=201 height=123 id="_x0000_i1027"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
  <td width=218 valign=top style='width:163.45pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=200 height=122 id="_x0000_i1028"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width=219 valign=top style='width:164.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=205 height=125 id="_x0000_i1029"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
  <td width=218 valign=top style='width:163.35pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=201 height=123 id="_x0000_i1030"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
  <td width=218 valign=top style='width:163.45pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=202 height=124 id="_x0000_i1031"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td width=219 valign=top style='width:164.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=205 height=125 id="_x0000_i1032"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
  <td width=218 valign=top style='width:163.35pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=201 height=123 id="_x0000_i1033"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
  <td width=218 valign=top style='width:163.45pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><img width=202 height=124 id="_x0000_i1034"
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11320_001.jpg" ></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=655 colspan=3 valign=top style='width:491.05pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Figure 2: Formed nine triangles are shown by filling them
  with black.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>When number of lattice points on
the lines are very small, then such triangles are very easy to count, but for
large number of lattice points such triangles are hard to count, let alone
measuring the average height of such triangles.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this problem you have to do
this mammoth task. Given the values of x1down, x2down, x1up, x2up and h your
job is to find the average height of all the triangles formed whose base is
x-axis and height is less than h.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
5001 lines of inputs. Each line contains five integer numbers x<sub>1</sub>down,
x<sub>2</sub>down (0&#8804;x<sub>1</sub>down&lt;x<sub>2</sub>down&#8804;100000
and |x<sub>1</sub>down-x<sub>2</sub>down|&#8804;10000), x<sub>1</sub>up, x<sub>2</sub>up
(0&#8804;x<sub>1</sub>up&lt;x<sub>2</sub>up&#8804;100000 and |x<sub>1</sub>up-x<sub>2</sub>up|&#8804;10000)
and h (0&lt;h&#8804;10).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input is terminated by a line containing five zeroes. &nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. This line contains the serial of output followed by a
floating-point number which denotes the average height of the formed triangles.
The floating point number should have six digits after the decimal point.
Errors less than 1.5*10<sup>-6</sup>.will <span class=GramE>be</span> ignored.
Look at the output for sample input for details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>5 8 5 7 1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0 2 0 2 1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0 100 0 101 1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span>
  <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 0.542593</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 0.500000</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 0.498223</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Problemsetter</span>: Shahriar Manzoor</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Special Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span></p>

</div>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sort! Sort!! And Sort!!! </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Hmm!
Here you are asked to do a simple sorting. You will be given N numbers and a
positive integer M. You will have to sort the N numbers in ascending order of <span
class=GramE>their modulo</span> M value. If there is a tie between an odd
number and an even number (that is <span class=GramE>their modulo</span> M
value is the same) then the odd number will precede the even number. If there
is a tie between two odd numbers (that is <span class=GramE>their modulo</span>
M value is the same) then the larger odd number will precede the smaller odd
number and if there is a tie between two even numbers (that is their modulo M
value is the same) then the smaller even number will precede the larger even
number. For remainder value of negative numbers follow the rule of C programming
language: A negative number can never have modulus greater than zero. <span
class=GramE>E.g. <span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>-100 MOD 3 = -1</span>,
<span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>-100 MOD 4 = 0</span> etc.</span> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:windowtext'>Input</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'><br>
</span>The input file contains 20 sets of inputs. Each set starts with two
integers N (0&lt;N&lt;=10000) and M (0&lt;M&lt;=10000) which denotes how many
numbers are within this set. Each of the next N lines contains one number each.
These numbers should all fit in 32-bit signed integer. Input is terminated by a
line containing two zeroes. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;
color:windowtext'>Output</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:windowtext'><br>
</span>For each set of input produce N+1 lines of outputs. The first line of
each set contains the value of N and M. The next N lines contain N numbers,
sorted according to the rules mentioned above. Print the last two zeroes of the
input file in the output file also.</p>

<h1><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>            </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>          </span>Output for Sample Input</span><span
style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=299 valign=top style='width:224.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>15 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>5<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>6<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>7<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>8<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>9<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>11<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>12<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>13<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>14<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>15<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=317 valign=top style='width:237.95pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>15 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>15<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>9<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>12<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>7<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>11<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>14<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<title>Problem H - Romeo and Juliet</title>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Romeo and Juliet</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><img width=237 height=288
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11322_0.jpg"  align=left hspace=12>Ah Romeo and Juliet!! Only if
they had slightly better Math skills, they might had escaped their sad death
and still would have been alive and dancing (They are immortal you know) !!!</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>As their problem can be a problem
of your life too, so lets just pose to you the problem that they were never
able to solve, an untold story now for several hundred years.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Every Saturday morning Romeo and
Juliet used to meet at a random place in a forest hoping that no one would see
them there. We cannot simulate the exact behavior of them so we make the
following simplifications:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in'>(a)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Both Romeo and
Juliet started from their own home. The Cartesian coordinates of their homes
were (R<sub>x</sub>, R<sub>y</sub>) and (J<sub>x</sub>, J<sub>y</sub>) respectively.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in'>(b)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>They started from
their respective home at the same time.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in'>(c)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>They reached
their destination at the same time. Actually they did not reach their
destination in different time for Juliets safety. So if there was a place
(point) where they could not reach at the same time then that could not be one
of their possible meeting places. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in'>(d)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Arrogant Romeo had a
fixed velocity of walking but mild Juliet could change her velocity. In other
words we can say that arrogant Romeo walked at a constant speed S<sub>R</sub>
and never changed his initial walking direction and Juliet could vary her
walking speed within the limit S<sub>J1</sub> and S<sub>J2 </sub>but she also could
not change her initial walking direction. Juliet also could not walk faster
than Romeo. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in'>(e)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Due to their
speed, velocity and other constraints explained above they could not meet at
all points.    </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in'>(f)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Each morning
they selected one location (Location means a point in two dimensional Cartesian
coordinate system) randomly from all their possible meeting places.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Juliets father had an
observation tower which tried to monitor the activities of Romeo and Juliet. It
was located at (T<sub>x</sub>, T<sub>y</sub>) and the watchman on top of it
could see up to a distance (T<sub>r</sub>) around it. So if Romeo and Juliet
met within its range, it could report it to Juliets father. Given all the
information mentioned above and the value of T<sub>x</sub>, T<sub>y</sub> and T<sub>r</sub>
your job is to find the probability that Romeo and Juliets meeting was seen by
the watchman at the observation tower. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file
contains a positive integer N (N&lt;2001) which denotes how many set of inputs
follows. Each set of input is given in three lines. The description of each set
is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of each set
contains four integers which denote the values of R<sub>x</sub>, R<sub>y</sub>,
J<sub>x</sub>, J<sub>y</sub>, (|R<sub>x</sub>|&#8804;1000, |R<sub>y</sub>|&#8804;1000,
|J<sub>x</sub>|&#8804;1000, |J<sub>y</sub>|&#8804;1000) respectively. The
second line contains three integers which denote the values of T<sub>x</sub>, T<sub>y</sub>
(|T<sub>x</sub>|&#8804;1000 and |T<sub>y</sub>|&#8804;1000) and T<sub>r</sub>
(1&#8804;T<sub>r</sub>&#8804;1000) respectively. The third line contains three
integers<span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'> </span></span>S<sub>R</sub>, S<sub>J1</sub>, S<sub>J2</sub>
(0&lt;S<sub>J1</sub>&lt;S<sub>J2</sub>&#8804; S<sub>R</sub>&#8804;30).</p>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>&nbsp;</span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>The meaning of R<sub>x</sub>, R<sub>y</sub>, J<sub>x</sub>, J<sub>y</sub>, T<sub>x</sub>, T<sub>y</sub>, T<sub>r</sub>, S<sub>R</sub>, S<sub>J1 </sub>and
S<sub>J2 </sub>are given in the problem statement above. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce one line of
output. This line contains the serial of output followed by floating-point
number which denotes the probability that the meeting of Romeo and Juliet was
recorded by the watchman of the observation tower of Juliets father. This
floating point-number should have four digits after the decimal point. Look at
the output for sample input for details.</h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input                             
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>2</span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>40 40 400 80</span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>220 220 280</span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>20 9 12</span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>40 40 400 80</span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>220 220 280</span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>20 9 17</span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></pre></td>
  <td width=330 valign=top style='width:247.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Scenario
  1: 0.1040</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Scenario
  2: 0.0172</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>
